spells.name: Dark Flight
spells.description: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact.
spells.tooltip: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies and knocking up targets at the center of impact for {{ e5 }} second.

spells.name: Blood Thirst / Blood Price
spells.description: While toggled on Aatrox deals bonus damage every third subsequent attack at the expense of his own Health. While toggled off Aatrox restores Health every third subsequent attack.
spells.tooltip:
While toggled off Aatrox benefits from Blood Thirst, while toggled on Blood Price is activated and removes Blood Thirst.

Blood Thirst: Every third attack, Aatrox restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f5 }}) when below half Health.

Blood Price: Every third attack, Aatrox deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus physical damage and loses {{ f4 }} Health.

spells.name: Blades of Torment
spells.description: Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing damage to all enemies hit and slowing them.
spells.tooltip: Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Massacre
spells.description: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, damaging all nearby enemy champions around him and gaining increased Attack Speed and bonus Attack Range for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions around him. Massacre then fills Aatrox's Blood Well by {{ e7 }}% for each champion hit and grants him {{ e3 }}% attack speed and 175 attack range for 12 seconds.

spells.name: Orb of Deception
spells.description: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back. Ahri gains movement speed that decays while her orb is traveling.
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on the way out, and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage on the way back.

Ahri gains movement speed that decays while her orb is traveling.

spells.name: Fox-Fire
spells.description: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Releases three fox-fires that lock on to nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Enemies hit with multiple fox-fires take 30% damage from each additional fox-fire beyond the first, for a maximum of {{ f1 }} damage to a single enemy.

spells.name: Charm
spells.description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.
spells.tooltip: Blows a kiss dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and charms an enemy causing them to walk harmlessly towards Ahri for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Spirit Rush
spells.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging 3 nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions). Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.
spells.tooltip: Nimbly dashes forward firing 3 essence bolts at nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Can be cast up to three times within 10 seconds before going on cooldown.

spells.name: Mark of the Assassin
spells.description: Akali spins her kama at a target enemy to deal Magic Damage and mark the target for 6 seconds. Akali's melee attacks against a marked target will trigger and consume the mark to cause additional damage and restore Energy.
spells.tooltip:
Akali throws her kama at a target enemy to deal {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and mark the target for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Akali's melee attacks against a marked target will consume the mark to cause {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage and restore {{ e2 }} Energy.

spells.name: Twilight Shroud
spells.description: Akali throws down a cover of smoke. While inside the area, Akali becomes invisible and gains a short burst of Movement Speed. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her. Enemies inside the smoke have their Movement Speed reduced.
spells.tooltip:
Akali throws down a cover of smoke that lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds. While inside the area, Akali becomes invisible and gains a {{ e2 }}% burst of Movement Speed which decays over 1 second. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.

Enemies inside the smoke are slowed by {{ e3 }}%.

spells.name: Crescent Slash
spells.description: Akali flourishes her kamas, dealing damage based on her Attack Damage and Ability Power.
spells.tooltip: Akali flourishes her kamas, slicing nearby enemy units for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

spells.name: Shadow Dance
spells.description: Akali moves through shadows to quickly strike through her target, dealing damage and consuming an Essence of Shadow charge. Akali recharges Essence of Shadow charges both periodically and upon kills and assists, max 3 stacks.
spells.tooltip:
Akali moves through shadows to quickly strike through her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage.

Akali stores an Essence of Shadow on kills and assists as well as every {{ f1 }} seconds up to {{ e4 }} total.

spells.name: Pulverize
spells.description: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to all nearby enemies and tossing them into the air for 1.5 seconds. On landing, enemies are stunned.
spells.tooltip: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and tossing all nearby enemy units into the air, stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Headbutt
spells.description: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.
spells.tooltip: Alistar charges at an enemy and rams them, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them while knocking them back.

spells.name: Triumphant Roar
spells.description: Alistar lets out a commanding war cry, restoring Health to himself and nearby friendly units for half the amount. Can be cast more often if nearby enemies are dying.
spells.tooltip: Restores {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to Alistar and half as much to nearby allies. Cooldown is reduced by {{ e1 }} seconds each time a nearby enemy unit dies.

spells.name: Unbreakable Will
spells.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, gaining bonus damage, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.
spells.tooltip: Removes disables from Alistar, and Alistar gains {{ e3 }} Attack Damage and takes {{ e4 }}% reduced physical and magic damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Bandage Toss
spells.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
spells.tooltip: Throws a bandage to target location. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu will pull himself to the enemy, stun them for 1 second, and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Despair
spells.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Nearby enemies take {{ e2 }} magic damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum Health each second.

spells.name: Tantrum
spells.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Amumu takes {{ e1 }} reduced damage from physical attacks.

Active: Amumu deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding units. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

spells.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
spells.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.
spells.tooltip: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and preventing attacks and movement for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Flash Frost
spells.description: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.
spells.tooltip:
A massive chunk of ice flies toward target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and chilling targets, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%.

At the end of its range or if Anivia activates the spell again, the missile detonates, doing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a small area and stunning units for {{ e4 }} second.

spells.name: Crystallize
spells.description: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.
spells.tooltip: Anivia summons an impassable wall of ice {{ e2 }} units wide, blocking all movement. The wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds before it melts.

spells.name: Frostbite
spells.description: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing a medium amount of damage. If the target has been slowed by Flash Frost or Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.
spells.tooltip: Anivia blasts her target with a freezing wind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If the target has been slowed by Flash Frost or Glacial Storm, they take double damage.

spells.name: Glacial Storm
spells.description: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.
spells.tooltip:
Toggle: Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second and chilling targets, slowing their Attack and Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}%.

Drains {{ e2 }} Mana per second.

spells.name: Disintegrate
spells.description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Mana cost and half the cooldown are refunded if Disintegrate kills the target.

spells.name: Incinerate
spells.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
spells.tooltip: Casts a cone of fire dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area.

spells.name: Molten Shield
spells.description: Increases Annie's Armor and Magic Resist and damages enemies who hit Annie with basic attacks.
spells.tooltip: Increases Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }} for {{ e3 }} seconds. Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies who attack Annie with basic attacks.

spells.name: Summon: Tibbers
spells.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
spells.tooltip:
Tibbers appears in a burst of flame dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area.

For the next {{ e6 }} seconds, Tibbers chases down enemies and deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second to nearby foes. If Annie casts Molten Shield while Tibbers is active he will receive the shield and a short decaying speed boost.

Tibbers can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

spells.name: Ranger's Focus
spells.description: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Basic attacks grant Focus for {{ e1 }} seconds, stacking up to {{ e2 }} times. At {{ e2 }} stacks, Ranger's Focus can be cast, consuming all Focus.

Active: For {{ e3 }} seconds, Ashe gains {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed, and her basic attacks fire a flurry of arrows resulting in {{ f1 }} physical damage per attack. During this time, she does not stack Focus.

spells.name: Volley
spells.description: Ashe fires 9 arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.
spells.tooltip:
Fires arrows in a cone, each dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Champion hits count as Critical Strikes for the purposes of Frost Shot.
Enemies can block multiple arrows, but only take damage from the first.

spells.name: Hawkshot
spells.description: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.
spells.tooltip: Reveals terrain as it flies toward target location anywhere on the map. Grants vision for 5 seconds. Ashe can store up to 2 charges of Hawkshot at a time.

spells.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
spells.description: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion for up to 3.5 seconds, based on how far the arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.
spells.tooltip: Launches a crystal arrow of ice in a line that stuns an enemy Champion dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The farther the arrow flies, the longer the stun, up to {{ e2 }} seconds. Surrounding enemies take half damage.

spells.name: Conquering Sands
spells.description: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers toward a target location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to all targets they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.
spells.tooltip:
Azir sends all Sand Soldiers toward a target location. Sand Soldiers deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies they pass through and apply a {{ e2 }}% slow for 1 second.

Enemies hit by multiple Sand Soldiers will have the slow duration refreshed, but will not take additional damage.

spells.name: Arise!
spells.description: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e3 }}% attack speed.

Active: Azir summons a Sand Soldier for {{ e1 }} seconds. When Azir attacks an enemy in a soldier's range, the soldier attacks instead of Azir, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in a line. If multiple soldiers strike the same target, each soldier after the first deals 25% damage. Soldiers attack even if Azir himself isn't in basic attack range.

Azir can store up to {{ maxammo }} Sand Soldiers at a time. A new soldier becomes available every {{ f1 }} seconds. Moving too far away from soldiers deactivates them. Sand Soldiers expire twice as fast when near an enemy turret.

Azir can expend a soldier to damage an enemy turret by summoning it on top of the turret. This deals {{ f4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to the turret.

spells.name: Shifting Sands
spells.description: Azir dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he gains a shield.
spells.tooltip: Azir dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If Azir hits an enemy champion, he stops and gains a {{ e6 }} second shield that absorbs {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [15% of bonus Health] damage.

spells.name: Emperor's Divide
spells.description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Azir summons a wall of armored soldiers that charge forward, knocking back enemies and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The soldiers then remain as a wall for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies will be stopped by Emperor's Divide, even if they attempt to dash over the wall, but Azir and his allies can pass freely and gain {{ e5 }}% Movement Speed for 1 second when they pass through the wall.

Emperor's Divide does not interact with Azir's basic attacks or spells.

spells.name: Cosmic Binding
spells.description: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both.
spells.tooltip:
Bard fires an energy bolt, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to one or two enemies. The first target hit will be slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} second(s).

If the bolt hits another enemy or a wall, any enemies hit are stunned for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Caretaker's Shrine
spells.description: Reveals a healing shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing the first ally that touches it.
spells.tooltip:
Bard raises a health shrine that immediately offers {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health, but restores up to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health as it gathers power for 10 seconds. The shrine's effect also grants {{ e1 }}% decaying movement speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Bard can have up to 3 shrines active at once, which remain until visited by an ally champion or crushed by an enemy champion.

Active Shrines: {{ f1 }} / {{ f2 }}

spells.name: Magical Journey
spells.description: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.
spells.tooltip:
Bard opens a one-way corridor through nearby terrain. Both allies and enemies can use the corridor by right-clicking on any part of it while near its entrance, with allies travelling {{ e6 }}% faster than enemies.

The corridor disappears after {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Tempered Fate
spells.description: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.
spells.tooltip:
Bard sends magical energy arcing to a target location. On impact, all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets in the target area are put in stasis, becoming invincible, untargetable, and unable to act for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Epic monsters are also put into stasis, despite normally being immune to disables.

spells.name: Rocket Grab
spells.description: Blitzcrank fires his right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to him.
spells.tooltip: Blitzcrank fires his right hand, if it encounters an enemy unit it will stun them and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage while he pulls them to himself.

spells.name: Overdrive
spells.description: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased Movement and Attack Speed. He is temporarily slowed after the effect ends.
spells.tooltip: Blitzcrank supercharges himself to increase Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decays over the duration. When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank's Movement Speed is slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Power Fist
spells.description: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double damage and pop his target up in the air.
spells.tooltip: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double his total attack damage as physical damage and pop his target up in the air.

spells.name: Static Field
spells.description: Passively causes lightning bolts to damage a nearby enemy. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to damage nearby enemies and silence them for 0.5 seconds, but doing so removes the passive lightning until Static Field becomes available again.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Lightning arcs off of Blitzcrank to hit a random nearby enemy for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every 2.5 seconds.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and silences surrounding enemy units for 0.5 seconds. The passive is not in effect during the cooldown.

spells.name: Sear
spells.description: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 2 seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for {{ f1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Pillar of Flame
spells.description: After a short delay, Brand creates a pillar of flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.
spells.tooltip:
After a short delay, Brand creates a pillar of flame at a target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemy units within the area.

Blaze: Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage from Pillar of Flame.

spells.name: Conflagration
spells.description: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing magic damage to them. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.

spells.name: Pyroclasm
spells.description: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing magic damage each time it bounces. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will priotize champions for the next bounce.
spells.tooltip:
Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each time it bounces up to 5 bounces.

Blaze: If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will prioritize champions for the next bounce.

spells.name: Winter's Bite
spells.description:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.
spells.tooltip:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [2.5% of Braum's Max Health] magic damage to the first target hit and slowing them by {{ e2 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.

spells.name: Stand Behind Me
spells.description: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion.

On arrival, Braum and the ally gain {{ f3 }} Armor and {{ f4 }} Magic Resist ({{ e4 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of Braum's bonus Armor/Magic Resist) for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Unbreakable
spells.description: Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction.
spells.tooltip:
Braum reduces incoming damage and blocks for allies behind him.
Braum raises his shield in a direction for {{ e2 }} seconds negating the damage of the next attack from this direction. Subsequent attacks deal {{ e3 }}% reduced damage.

Braum intercepts projectiles, causing them to hit him and be destroyed.

Braum gains {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed for the duration.

spells.name: Glacial Fissure
spells.description: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.

Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The first champion hit is knocked up for {{ e5 }} seconds, subsequent enemies are knocked up briefly.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds enemies that enter the area are slowed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

spells.name: Piltover Peacemaker
spells.description: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
spells.tooltip:
Revs the rifle for {{ e4 }} second to fire a narrow piercing shot dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. After hitting any target, it opens into a wider shot that deals {{ e2 }}% less damage.

Always deals full damage to trap revealed targets.

spells.name: Yordle Snap Trap
spells.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap immobilizes the champion, reveals them for a short duration, and deals magic damage over 1.5 seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Sets traps that an enemy Champion can spring, immobilizing them for {{ e1 }} seconds and revealing them for a short duration.

Traps last for {{ e3 }} seconds. {{ e5 }} traps may be active at once.

Trapped enemies take an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) increased damage from Headshot.

label: Recharge Rate
Maximum Traps
Bonus Headshot Damage on Trapped Targets

spells.name: 90 Caliber Net
spells.description: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.
spells.tooltip: Fires a net, knocking Caitlyn backwards. The net deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slows the first enemy hit by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} second.

spells.name: Ace in the Hole
spells.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
spells.tooltip: Takes a second to line up the perfect shot on an enemy Champion at up to {{ e2 }} range. The shot deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage, but other enemy Champions can intercept it.

spells.name: Noxious Blast
spells.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
spells.tooltip:
Cassiopeia blasts an area after a brief delay. Enemies in the area are Poisoned, taking {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

If Noxious Blast hits an enemy champion, Cassiopeia gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Miasma
spells.description: Cassiopeia releases a cloud of poison, lightly damaging and slowing any enemy that happens to pass through it.
spells.tooltip:
Cassiopeia releases a toxic cloud that grows in size over {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the cloud are Poisoned for {{ e3 }} seconds, causing them to take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second and be slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

The cloud continually reapplies this Poison to enemies within it.

spells.name: Twin Fang
spells.description: Cassiopeia lets loose a damaging attack at her target, increasing further Poison damage dealt to the target. If the target dies, Cassiopeia regains Mana. If the target is poisoned, the cooldown of this spell is refreshed.
spells.tooltip:
Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to her target. If Twin Fang kills the target, Cassiopeia refunds its cost and restores {{ e10 }}% of her maximum Mana ({{ f3 }}). If the target is Poisoned, then Twin Fang's cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds.

Hitting an enemy with Twin Fang increases Cassiopeia's Poison damage dealt to the target by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e9 }} seconds. This effect stacks up to two times.

spells.name: Petrifying Gaze
spells.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
spells.tooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Rupture
spells.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
spells.tooltip: Ruptures the ground at target location. Enemies caught in the rupture are launched into the air for 1 second, take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, and are slowed by 60% for 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Feral Scream
spells.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
spells.tooltip: Silences enemies in a cone for {{ e2 }} second(s) and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Vorpal Spikes
spells.description: Cho'Gath's attacks passively release deadly spikes, dealing damage to all enemy units in front of him.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Basic attacks launch spikes that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Spikes grow wider as Cho'Gath gains Feast stacks.

spells.name: Feast
spells.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health (maximum 6 stacks). Cho'Gath loses half of his stacks upon death. Half the cooldown and mana cost are refunded if a minion or monster is killed.
spells.tooltip:
Ravenously feed on an enemy unit, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage to champions or 1000 (+{{ a1 }}) to minions and monsters. If Feast deals a killing blow, Cho'Gath gains a stack of Feast, which causes him to grow in size and gain {{ e3 }} maximum health, as well as a bonus effect based on the target.

Bonus from champions: gain an additional stack of Feast.
Bonus from minions and monsters: refund 50% of Feast's cooldown and cost.

Cho'Gath cannot have more than 6 stacks of Feast at once and loses half of his stacks upon dying.

spells.name: Phosphorus Bomb
spells.description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.
spells.tooltip: Corki lobs a bomb, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area. In addition, the blast reveals the area and champions hit by the blast for 6 seconds (does not reveal stealth).

spells.name: Valkyrie
spells.description: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Corki flies a short distance, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to enemies in the fire left along his path.

Special Delivery: Corki flies a great distance, dropping bombs that knock aside enemies and leave a burning trail for 5 seconds. The trail slows enemies by {{ e2 }}% and burns them for {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage per second.

spells.name: Gatling Gun
spells.description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.
spells.tooltip: Corki's gatling gun fires in front of him for {{ e1 }} seconds, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) damage (half physical, half magic), and reducing {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist per second. The Armor and Magic Resist reductions stack and last 2 seconds.

spells.name: Missile Barrage
spells.description: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Corki fires a missile that explodes at the first enemy it hits, dealing {{ e1 }} {{ f3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all nearby enemies.

Corki can store up to 7 missiles, and every 3rd missile will be a Big One, dealing {{ e8 }}% increased damage.

spells.name: Decimate
spells.description: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions hit by the blade.
spells.tooltip:
After a short delay, Darius swings his axe around himself, striking enemies in its path. Enemies hit by the axe's blade take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Enemies hit by the handle take {{ e6 }}% damage (does not apply Hemorrhage).

Darius heals for {{ e5 }}% of his missing Health per enemy champion hit by the blade (max: {{ e7 }}%).

spells.name: Crippling Strike
spells.description: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.
spells.tooltip:
Darius's next basic attack deals {{ f1 }} physical damage and slows the target by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} second.

Crippling Strike refunds its Mana cost and {{ e3 }}% of its cooldown if it kills the target.

spells.name: Apprehend
spells.description: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Darius gains {{ e1 }}% Armor Penetration.

Active: Pulls in all enemies in front of Darius and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

spells.name: Noxian Guillotine
spells.description: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.
spells.tooltip:
Leaps to target enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) true damage. For each stack of Hemorrhage on the target, Noxian Guillotine deals an additional {{ e3 }}% damage.

Maximum Damage: {{ f3 }}

If Noxian Guillotine kills the target, it may be re-cast at no cost within 20 seconds.

At rank 3, Noxian Guillotine unlocks - its cooldown resets entirely on kills and it no longer has a Mana cost.

spells.name: Crescent Strike
spells.description: Diana swings her blade to unleash a bolt of lunar energy that deals damage in an arc before exploding. Afflicts enemies struck with the Moonlight debuff, revealing them if they are not stealthed.
spells.tooltip:
Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Pale Cascade
spells.description: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.
spells.tooltip:
Creates three orbiting spheres that explode on contact with enemies dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Lasts {{ e1 }} seconds.

Grants a temporary shield that absorbs {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage. If the third sphere detonates, the shield increases by {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

spells.name: Moonfall
spells.description: Diana draws in and slows all nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip: Reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and then slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Lunar Rush
spells.description: Diana dashes to an enemy and deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.
spells.tooltip:
Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.

spells.name: Spinning Axe
spells.description: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.
spells.tooltip:
Draven's next attack will deal {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage. The bonus is equal to {{ e2 }}% of his total Attack Damage.

This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe.

Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

spells.name: Blood Rush
spells.description: Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.
spells.tooltip:
Draven gains {{ e2 }}% increased Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds and {{ e4 }}% increased Attack Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration.

Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

spells.name: Stand Aside
spells.description: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.
spells.tooltip: Draven throws his axes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Whirling Death
spells.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.
spells.tooltip:
Draven hurls two massive axes to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to each unit struck.

Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals 8% less damage for each unit hit (Minimum {{ e2 }}%) and resets when the axes reverse direction.

spells.name: Infected Cleaver
spells.description: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health and slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned half of the Health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver (increased to the full Health cost on killing blows).
spells.tooltip:
Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% of the target's current Health ({{ e1 }} damage minimum) and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds. (Max {{ e6 }} damage to Monsters)

Half of the Health cost is refunded if the cleaver hits a target (increased to the full Health cost on killing blows).

spells.name: Burning Agony
spells.description: Dr. Mundo drains his Health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Dr. Mundo deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies per second, and reduces the duration of disables on Dr. Mundo by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Masochism
spells.description: Masochism deals bonus damage on Dr. Mundo's next basic attack and increases Attack Damage by a flat amount for 5 seconds. In addition, Dr. Mundo also gains an additional amount of Attack Damage for each percentage of Health he is missing.
spells.tooltip: Dr. Mundo deals an additional {{ f1 }} damage ({{ e6 }}% of max health) on his next basic attack and increases Attack Damage by {{ e1 }} for {{ e4 }} seconds. Dr. Mundo gains an additional +{{ e3 }} Attack Damage for each percentage of Health he is missing.

spells.name: Sadism
spells.description: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Movement Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.
spells.tooltip: Dr. Mundo regenerates {{ f1 }} Health ({{ e1 }}% of max health) over {{ e2 }} seconds. Additionally, he gains {{ e3 }}% movement speed during this time.

spells.name: Timewinder
spells.description: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.
spells.tooltip: Ekko throws a device that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies it passes through. It expands into a slowing field on the first champion hit, slowing everything inside by {{ e2 }}%. It then returns to him after a delay, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to all targets hit upon return.

spells.name: Parallel Convergence
spells.description: Ekko splits the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and triggers a detonation, stunning enemies by suspending them in time.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Ekko's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage to enemies under 30% health equal to {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of their missing health (max {{ e5 }} damage vs. minions and monsters).

Active: After a 3 second delay, Ekko creates a short-lived chronosphere at the target location that slows enemies who enter by 40%. If Ekko enters the sphere, he will detonate it, gaining a shield that absorbs up to {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 2 seconds. Enemies caught inside are stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Phase Dive
spells.description: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.
spells.tooltip: Ekko dashes a short distance in the targeted direction. His next attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and teleport him to his target.

spells.name: Chronobreak
spells.description: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.
spells.tooltip: Makes Ekko invulnerable and untargetable, and teleports him back to wherever he was 4 seconds ago. Ekko heals himself for {{ e3 }} + {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of the damage taken over the last 4 seconds, and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all nearby enemies on arrival.

spells.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
spells.description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
spells.tooltip: Deals magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's current health. Maximum bonus against monsters: {{ e2 }}.

spells.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
spells.description:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
spells.tooltip: Summons a venom-gorged Spiderling that moves to target location and explodes, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds.

spells.name: Cocoon / Rappel
spells.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.
spells.tooltip: Stuns the first enemy hit for {{ e5 }} seconds and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

spells.name: Spider Form
spells.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
spells.tooltip:
Elise transforms into a menacing spider, sacrificing 425 attack range in exchange for {{ e3 }} movement speed and access to arachnid abilities. All dormant Spiderlings are awakened and will attack nearby foes.

Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and take {{ e4 }}% reduced damage from multi-target abilities.

spells.name: Hate Spike
spells.description: Evelynn fires a line of spikes through an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.
spells.tooltip:
Evelynn fires a line of spikes through a nearby enemy dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in its path.

Hate Spike prioritizes the target Evelynn is attacking.

spells.name: Dark Frenzy
spells.description: Evelynn passively increases her Movement Speed when hitting enemy champions with her spells. Upon activation, Evelynn breaks free from slows affecting her and gains a massive Movement Speed boost for a short duration.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Evelynn removes all slows affecting her and gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Passive: Evelynn's spell hits on enemy champions reduce Dark Frenzy's cooldown by 1 second.

Champion kills and assists refresh Dark Frenzy's cooldown.

spells.name: Ravage
spells.description: Evelynn slashes her target twice, dealing damage with each hit. She then gains increased Attack Speed for a short duration.
spells.tooltip:
Evelynn swiftly attacks a target {{ e3 }} times (applies on-hit effects), dealing a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Evelynn then gains {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Agony's Embrace
spells.description: Evelynn summons spikes from the ground to deal damage and slow enemies in the area. She then gains a shield based on how many enemy champions were hit.
spells.tooltip:
Evelynn impales all enemies in the targeted area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their current Health in magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Evelynn siphons their pain, gaining a {{ e4 }} health shield for each enemy champion hit which lasts up to 6 seconds.

spells.name: Mystic Shot
spells.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1.5 seconds if it strikes an enemy unit.
spells.tooltip:
Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage (applies on-hit effects).

Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by {{ e2 }} seconds if Mystic Shot hits a target.

spells.name: Essence Flux
spells.description: Ezreal fires a fluctuating wave of energy, dealing magic damage to enemy champions, while increasing the Attack Speed of allied champions.
spells.tooltip: Ezreal fires a wave of energy that damages all enemy champions it passes through for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If Ezreal or his Allied champions are hit by the wave, their Attack Speed is increased by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Arcane Shift
spells.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit.
spells.tooltip: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt at the nearest enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Trueshot Barrage
spells.description: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a powerful barrage of energy missiles which do massive damage to each unit they pass through (deals 10% less damage to each unit it passes through).
spells.tooltip: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a barrage of missiles dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each unit it passes through. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (minimum {{ e3 }}%).

spells.name: Terrify
spells.description: Strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.
spells.tooltip: Strikes a target enemy unit with fear, applying Dread and causing it to flee in terror for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Drain
spells.description: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second to target unit and heals Fiddlesticks for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.
Lasts up to 5 seconds.

spells.name: Dark Wind
spells.description: A wisp of wind strikes an enemy unit and then bounces to nearby enemy units, dealing damage and silencing the victims.
spells.tooltip:
Fires a missile at the targeted enemy that deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and silences for 1.25 seconds before bouncing to a new target (deals 150% damage to minions and monsters).

Dark Wind can bounce up to {{ e1 }} times and will prioritize enemies it has not yet hit. Targets can be hit multiple times but will only be silenced once.

spells.name: Crowstorm
spells.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage each second to all enemy units in the area.
spells.tooltip: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks for 5 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second to all enemy units in the area. This has a 1.5 second channel duration and teleports Fiddlesticks to target location.

spells.name: Lunge
spells.description: Fiora lunges in a direction and slashes a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.
spells.tooltip:
Fiora lunges in a direction and slashes a nearby enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying on-hit effects. This attack prioritizes Vitals and targets in kill range.

If this ability hits an enemy, {{ e4 }}% of its cooldown is refunded.

spells.name: Riposte
spells.description: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing disable with this ability.
spells.tooltip:
Fiora parries all incoming damage, debuffs, and disables for the next {{ e2 }} seconds and then stabs in the target direction.

The stab deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy champion and slows their movement and attack speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If Fiora parries an immobilizing disable, Riposte stuns instead of slowing.

spells.name: Bladework
spells.description: Fiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack slows the target, and the second attack will critically strike.
spells.tooltip: Fiora gains {{ e4 }}% increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack cannot critically strike, but applies a {{ e3 }}% slow for {{ e2 }} second. The second attack is guaranteed to critically strike for {{ f4 }}% damage ({{ f3 }}).

spells.name: Grand Challenge
spells.description: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on the target champion and gains movement speed while near them. If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Fiora reveals all four Vitals on the target champion, for a potential {{ f8 }}% max health true damage. In addition, Fiora gains Duelist's Dance's movement speed bonus ({{ f6 }}%) while near the target.

If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals in {{ e1 }} seconds or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed for {{ e7 }} (+{{ f9 }}) each second for between {{ e9 }} to {{ e6 }} seconds, scaling with the amount of Vitals hit.

spells.name: Urchin Strike
spells.description: Fizz strikes his target and runs them through, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.
spells.tooltip: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing normal attack damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. This spell applies on-hit effects.

spells.name: Seastone Trident
spells.description: Fizz's attacks passively rend his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds based on the target's missing Health. When activated, for a short duration, Fizz's attacks deal additional magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Fizz's attacks rend his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of the target's missing Health as magic damage over {{ e4 }} seconds.

Active: For {{ e6 }} seconds, Fizz's attacks deal an additional {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage on hit.

spells.name: Playful / Trickster
spells.description: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.
spells.tooltip:
Fizz hops toward your cursor onto his spear, becoming untargetable, and then slams the ground dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

Reactivating this ability while Fizz is on top of his spear causes Fizz to jump again towards your cursor and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a smaller area to enemies nearby, instead of slamming the ground.

spells.name: Chum the Waters
spells.description: Fizz releases a magical fish toward a location that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target  and amplifying all of Fizz's magic damage to them (except for Chum the Waters). After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.
spells.tooltip:
Fizz releases a magical fish toward a location attaching to any champion that walks over it, slowing their movement by {{ e2 }}% and amplifying magic damage by Fizz (except Chum the Waters) to the target by 20% for 6 seconds.

After {{ e3 }} seconds, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking other enemies aside dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and reducing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Resolute Smite
spells.description: Galio fires a concussive blast from his eyes, slowing and dealing damage to enemies caught near the impact point.
spells.tooltip: Galio fires a concussive blast from his eyes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies near the impact location, and reducing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Bulwark
spells.description: Galio shields an ally Champion, increasing their Armor and Magic Resistance, and restoring Galio's Health each time that Champion suffers damage.
spells.tooltip: Galio shields a friendly champion for {{ e4 }} seconds, increasing their Armor and Magic Resistance by {{ e1 }}. Each time the unit suffers damage, Galio is healed for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}). (-20% healing for each consecutive hit)

spells.name: Righteous Gust
spells.description: Galio claps his wings, unleashing a gust of concussive wind that damages enemies and leaves a directional draft in its wake that increases ally Movement Speed.
spells.tooltip: Galio unleashes a gust of concussive wind that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in its path. A directional draft remains for 5 seconds, increasing the Movement Speed of allies passing through it by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Idol of Durand
spells.description: Galio assumes the form of a statue, taunting nearby enemies and storing concussive energy as they attack him. Galio then bursts from his statue shell, releasing the stored energy to damage surrounding foes.
spells.tooltip:
Galio channels for 2 seconds, taunting nearby foes and blocking {{ e4 }}% of incoming damage.

After channeling, Galio deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, plus an additional {{ e2 }}% damage for each attack he suffered while channeling, up to a max of {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage ({{ e3 }}% bonus damage).

spells.name: Parrrley
spells.description: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.
spells.tooltip:
Fires a bullet that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage (can crit and applies on-hit effects).

If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders {{ e2 }} bonus Gold and {{ e5 }} Silver Serpents. (Trade Silver Serpents at the shop to upgrade Cannon Barrage).

spells.name: Remove Scurvy
spells.description: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.
spells.tooltip: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, curing all disabling effects and healing him for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) + {{ e2 }}% of his missing Health.

spells.name: Powder Keg
spells.description: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
spells.tooltip:
Place a powder keg that can be attacked by Gangplank or his enemies at target location for {{ e5 }} seconds.

If Gangplank destroys a keg, it explodes dealing the attack's damage as physical damage (ignores {{ e10 }}% Armor) to enemies and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Champions take {{ e3 }} bonus physical damage from the explosion.

When a keg explodes, other kegs with overlapping blast zones chain explode (damage does not stack).

Kegs health decays every {{ f5 }} seconds. (Decay rate increases at level 7 and 13)

Keg explosions apply Parrrley's plunder effect.

spells.name: Cannon Barrage
spells.description: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Signals Gangplank's ship to fire {{ f3 }} waves of cannonballs at an area over {{ e3 }} seconds. Each wave deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slows enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Collect Silver Serpents with Parrrley to upgrade in the shop.

spells.name: Decisive Strike
spells.description: Garen gains a burst of movement speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.
spells.tooltip:
Garen breaks free from all slows affecting him, and gains {{ e2 }}% movement speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

His next basic attack within {{ e6 }} seconds deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and silences his target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Courage
spells.description: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to grant himself a shield that reduces incoming damage for a short time.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Killing units permanently grants {{ f2 }} armor and magic resist, up to a maximum of {{ e3 }}. Current Bonus: {{ f1 }}

Active: Garen gains a defensive shield for {{ e4 }} seconds, reducing incoming damage by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Judgment
spells.description: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration.
spells.tooltip:
Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing {{ f3 }} physical damage to nearby enemies -- {{ e1 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of his attack damage (+{{ f1 }}), {{ f2 }} times (increased by 1 every 3 champion levels) -- over the duration.

Judgment deals {{ e4 }}% increased damage when striking only one enemy.
Cancelling Judgment returns cooldown equal to the remaining duration.
Judgment can critically strike for bonus damage.

label: Base Damage per Tick
Total Attack Damage Ratio per Tick

spells.name: Demacian Justice
spells.description:
The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Garen's attacks deal additional true damage to that champion.

Garen can call upon the might of Demacia to deal a finishing blow to an enemy champion that deals damage based upon how much health his target has missing. This damage is true damage against the Villain.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Judgment and basic attacks against it deal an additional {{ e3 }}% of its maximum health as true damage.

Active: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} magic damage plus {{ e2 }}% of the target's missing health. Deals true damage to the Villain.

spells.name: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss
spells.description:
Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.
spells.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Throws a boomerang that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slows enemies by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. The boomerang returns towards Gnar after hitting an enemy, dealing {{ e7 }}% damage to subsequent targets. Each enemy can only be hit once. Catching the boomerang reduces its cooldown by {{ f1 }}%.

Mega Gnar: Throws a boulder that stops when it hits an enemy, slowing all nearby enemies and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage. Picking up the boulder reduces its cooldown by {{ e6 }}%.

spells.name: Hyper / Wallop
spells.description:
Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Movement Speed.

Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.
spells.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Passive: Every 3rd attack or spell on the same target deals an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) + {{ e2 }}% of the target's max Health as magic damage and grants Gnar {{ f1 }}% Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds (max {{ e4 }} damage vs. monsters).

Mega Gnar: Stuns enemies in an area for 1.25 seconds, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage.

Gnar gains Hyper's Movement Speed bonus when he leaves Mega form.

spells.name: Hop / Crunch
spells.description:
Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.
spells.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Leaps to a location, gaining {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds. If Gnar lands on a unit he will bounce off it, traveling further. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage and slows briefly if the unit landed on was an enemy.

Mega Gnar: Leaps to a location and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage to all nearby enemies on landing. Enemies Gnar lands directly on top of are slowed briefly.

If Crunch is used to transform, Gnar will still be able to bounce.

spells.name: GNAR!
spells.description: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them.  Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.
spells.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Passive: Increases Boomerang Throw's cooldown reduction on catch to {{ e4 }}% and Hyper's Movement Speed bonus to {{ e2 }}%.

Mega Gnar: Knocks all nearby enemies in the specified direction, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage and slowing them by 45% for {{ e3 }} seconds. Any enemy that hits a wall takes 150% damage and is stunned instead of slowed.

spells.name: Barrel Roll
spells.description: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Movement Speed slowed.
spells.tooltip:
Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated again to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds (deals 70% damage to minions).

The damage and slow amount increase as the cask ferments, up to 150% after 2 seconds.

spells.name: Drunken Rage
spells.description: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.
spells.tooltip:
Gragas guzzles down his brew, taking {{ e1 }}% reduced damage for 2.5 seconds.

After finishing his drink, his next basic attack deals magic damage to nearby enemies equal to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of their max Health (max {{ e4 }} vs monsters).

spells.name: Body Slam
spells.description: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.
spells.tooltip:
Gragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy unit. He deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and bumps them back, stunning them for {{ e2 }} second.

Body Slam's Cooldown is reduced by {{ f1 }} seconds if Gragas collides with a unit.

spells.name: Explosive Cask
spells.description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
spells.tooltip: Gragas throws his cask, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area and knocking them back from the center.

spells.name: End of the Line
spells.description: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.25 seconds if it strikes terrain.
spells.tooltip:
Fires a powder round that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies in a line.

After 2 seconds, or 0.25 seconds on collision with terrain, the round detonates, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies.

spells.name: Smoke Screen
spells.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke. Enemies inside the smoke cloud have reduced sight range and Movement Speed.
spells.tooltip:
Creates a cloud of Black Smoke lasting 4 seconds. Enemies inside Black Smoke cannot see out.

Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slows by {{ e2 }}% on impact.

spells.name: Quickdraw
spells.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor and Magic Resist boost for several seconds. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.
spells.tooltip:
Dashes in a direction, reloading one shell. For 4 seconds, Graves gains True Grit.

Basic attack hits lower the cooldown of Quickdraw by {{ e4 }} seconds and, against non-minions, also refresh True Grit.

True Grit grants {{ e5 }} Armor and Magic Resist (stacks up to 4 times).

spells.name: Collateral Damage
spells.description: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.
spells.tooltip: Fires an explosive shell with such force that it knocks Graves back. The shell deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy hit. After hitting an enemy Champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage in a cone.

spells.name: Rampage
spells.description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage.
spells.tooltip:
Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. ({{ e5 }}% damage to minions)

If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with this attack he gains a stack of Rampage, reducing the base cooldown of this skill by {{ e3 }} second for a short duration. This effect can stack up to {{ e2 }} times.

spells.name: Spirit of Dread
spells.description: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.
spells.tooltip:
Hecarim deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to all nearby enemies. Hecarim is healed for {{ e1 }}% of the damage these enemies take from any source.

Hecarim cannot heal more than {{ e4 }} Health from minions or monsters.

spells.name: Devastating Charge
spells.description: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
spells.tooltip: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for {{ e5 }} seconds. His next attack knocks the target back dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage based on how far Hecarim has traveled during Devastating Charge (knockback distance also scales).

spells.name: Onslaught of Shadows
spells.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.
spells.tooltip:
Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to anyone they strike.

Hecarim releases a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee from Hecarim for {{ e2 }} second.

Hecarim himself will only move to the targeted location. The riders will always move the full distance.

spells.name: H-28G Evolution Turret
spells.description: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).
spells.tooltip:
Places a Turret at target location. Turret attacks prioritize Heimerdinger's targets and enemies attacking Heimerdinger. Their Health increases with Heimerdinger's champion level and they shut down if he moves out of the area. Heimerdinger generates a Turret Kit every {{ f1 }} seconds and can hold {{ e3 }} Kit(s) at once.

H-28G Evolution Turret Stats
Health: {{ f4 }} (+{{ f2 }})
Attack - Cannon: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and +{{ e9 }}% beam charge each attack.
Attack - Beam: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage in a line every {{ e6 }} seconds.
Maximum Turrets Placed: 3

spells.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
spells.description: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.
spells.tooltip:
Unleashes a barrage of 5 rockets that converge towards your cursor and fan out past it. Each rocket deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. Units hit multiple times take reduced damage:

Champions and Monsters: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage, max {{ e6 }} {{ f2 }} total damage
Minions: 60% of base damage

Aiming between Heimerdinger and the target increases the rocket spread.

spells.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
spells.description: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.
spells.tooltip: Hurls a grenade that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemy units and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast are also stunned for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: UPGRADE!!!
spells.description: Heimerdinger invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects.
spells.tooltip:
Makes next basic ability free and gives it bonus effects. Reactivate to cancel.

H-28Q Apex Turret: Places a Turret that deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage with its cannon and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage with its beam for 8 seconds. It has splash damage, immunity to disables, its attacks slow targets by 25% for 2 seconds, it receives 20% of a beam charge per attack, and it doesn't count toward the Turret limit.

Hextech Rocket Swarm: Fires 4 waves of rockets that deal {{ e8 }} {{ f1 }} Magic Damage each. Champions and Monsters hit by multiple rockets take reduced damage, max {{ e5 }} {{ f2 }}.

CH-3X Lightning Grenade: Throws a bouncing grenade that discharges three times, dealing {{ e10 }} {{ f4 }} Magic Damage. Both the stun and slow areas are larger and the slow is improved to 80%.

spells.name: Tentacle Smash
spells.description: Illaoi is healed for a percentage of her missing health whenever a Tentacle damages an enemy champion. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Illaoi is healed for {{ e5 }}% of her missing health whenever a Tentacle damages a champion.

Active: Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) physical damage.

spells.name: Harsh Lesson
spells.description: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.
spells.tooltip: For her next basic attack, Illaoi leaps to her target dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. When she strikes, nearby Tentacles will also swing at the target.

spells.name: Test of Spirit
spells.description: Illaoi rips the Spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the Spirit, the target will become a Vessel and begin spawning Tentacles.
spells.tooltip:
Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her, so she can teach them a lesson.
Illaoi calls on the power of her god to pull the Spirit from an enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds. The Spirit can be attacked by Illaoi and her allies and echoes {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f5 }}%) of the damage it takes to the target.

If the Spirit dies or the target leaves its range, the target becomes a Vessel. Vessels spawn a Tentacle every 10 seconds for 1 minute and have their movement speed slowed by {{ e8 }}%, decaying over {{ e5 }} seconds.

Tentacles swing at Spirits and Vessels dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) physical damage.

spells.name: Leap of Faith
spells.description: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.
spells.tooltip:
Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies.

A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit and, for the next {{ e1 }} seconds, Tentacles swing 50% faster, are untargetable, and Harsh Lesson has a 2 second cooldown.

'There are kind and gentle gods. Mine isn't one of those.'

spells.name: Bladesurge
spells.description: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target. If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown refreshes and refunds 35 Mana.
spells.tooltip:
Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown refreshes and refunds 35 Mana.

spells.name: Hiten Style
spells.description: Irelia is skilled in the art of Hiten, passively giving her physical attacks Health restoration. Activating Hiten Style doubles her Health restoration and gives her basic attacks true damage.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Basic attacks restore {{ e1 }} Health.

Active: Irelia's basic attacks deal {{ e2 }} true damage and doubles Health restored for 6 seconds.

spells.name: Equilibrium Strike
spells.description: Irelia's attack balances the scales, dealing damage and slowing the target. However, if the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, then the blow stuns the target instead of slowing.
spells.tooltip:
Irelia pierces her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing the target by 60% for {{ e2 }} second(s).

If the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, she stuns the target for the duration instead.

spells.name: Transcendent Blades
spells.description: Irelia summons 4 spirit blades that she can fling to deal physical damage and siphon life from enemies they pass through.
spells.tooltip: Irelia summons 4 spirit blades that she can fling to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies they pass through. She heals for 25% of the damage dealt against champions and 10% against minions and monsters.

spells.name: Howling Gale
spells.description: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.
spells.tooltip:
Summons a whirlwind, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in its path and knocks them into the air for {{ e4 }} seconds.

The whirlwind can be charged for up to 3 seconds. For each second it charges, it deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus damage, knocks up for an additional {{ e5 }} seconds, and travels {{ e3 }}% further.

Activate again to release the whirlwind early.

spells.name: Zephyr
spells.description: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) and allows movement through units.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to an enemy and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) for {{ e4 }} seconds. Passive benefit is lost while Zephyr is on cooldown.

spells.name: Eye Of The Storm
spells.description: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.
spells.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion or turret for {{ e3 }} seconds. The shield absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage and grants {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Attack Damage until it breaks.

spells.name: Monsoon
spells.description: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.
spells.tooltip: Summons forth the might of the wind to knock surrounding enemies back and restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to nearby allies each second for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Dragon Strike
spells.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of all enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
spells.tooltip:
Extends Jarvan IV's lance dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and lowering the Armor of all enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds.

If the lance contacts Demacian Standard it will pull Jarvan IV to its location, knocking up enemies in his path.

spells.name: Golden Aegis
spells.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
spells.tooltip: Temporarily gains a shield that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ e3 }} damage for each nearby enemy champion) damage for 5 seconds, and slows surrounding enemies by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Demacian Standard
spells.description: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Throws a Demacian Standard to a nearby area dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The Standard lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds and grants surrounding allied champions {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

spells.name: Cataclysm
spells.description: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them.
spells.tooltip:
Heroically leaps to an enemy Champion dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and creating an arena of impassable terrain around them for 3.5 seconds.

Activate again to collapse the terrain.

spells.name: Leap Strike
spells.description: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.
spells.tooltip: Jax leaps to a target unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage if it is an enemy.

spells.name: Empower
spells.description: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.
spells.tooltip: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next basic attack or Leap Strike to deal an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage.

spells.name: Counter Strike
spells.description: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Jax enters a defensive stance for up to 2 seconds, dodging all incoming basic attacks and taking {{ e3 }}% less damage from area of effect abilities.

After 2 seconds or if activated again, Jax stuns surrounding enemies for {{ e2 }} second and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to them.

Counter Strike deals {{ e5 }}% more damage for each attack Jax dodged (max: {{ e4 }}% increased damage).

spells.name: Grandmaster's Might
spells.description: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Every third consecutive strike Jax deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) additional Magic Damage.

Active: Jax strengthens his resolve, granting him {{ f2 }} Armor and {{ f1 }} Magic Resist for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Armor bonus is equal to {{ e3 }} + {{ e6 }}% bonus Attack Damage.
