Magic Resist bonus is equal to {{ e3 }} + {{ e7 }}% Ability Power.

spells.name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast
spells.description:
Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.

Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies in the area of the explosion.
spells.tooltip: Leaps to an enemy dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies and slowing them by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge
spells.description:
Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds.

Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e5 }} Mana per strike while in Hammer Stance.

Active: Creates an electric aura dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e2 }} seconds to nearby enemies.

spells.name: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate
spells.description:
Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance.

Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Movement Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e4 }}% of the enemy's maximum health (+{{ a1 }}) as magic damage and knocks them back a short distance. ({{ e1 }} Maximum Damage against monsters)

spells.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
spells.description:
Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.

Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and ranged attacks.

The next attack in Cannon Stance reduces the enemy's Armor and Magic Resist by {{ f3 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

label: Cannon Swap: Armor/Magic Resistance Shred
Hammer Swap: Bonus Damage
Hammer Passive: Bonus Armor and Magic Resist

spells.name: Dancing Grenade
spells.description: Jhin launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time it kills.
spells.tooltip:
Jhin launches a cartridge at the targeted enemy that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage before bouncing to a nearby target that has not yet been hit.

The cartridge can hit a maximum of 4 times. Each kill by the cartridge increases the damage of subsequent hits by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Deadly Flourish
spells.description: Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or basic attacks, they are rooted.
spells.tooltip:
Jhin fires a long range shot that stops on the first champion hit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to it, and 65% of that damage to minions and monsters hit along the way.

If Deadly Flourish strikes a champion that has been hit by one of Jhin's basic attacks, Lotus Traps, or allies within the last 4 seconds it will root them for {{ e2 }} seconds and grants Jhin movement speed as though he had crit them.

spells.name: Captive Audience
spells.description:
Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals.

Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse.
spells.tooltip:
Jhin places an invisible Lotus Trap at the target location that lasts {{ e5 }} minutes and activates when stepped on, revealing nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

The trap leaves behind a zone that slows enemies inside by {{ e7 }}% and detonates after 2 seconds, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage ({{ e1 }}% damage on subsequent hits and vs. minions and monsters).

Jhin prepares a new trap every {{ f1 }} seconds and can store 2 at once.

Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion a Lotus Trap will spawn and detonate where they were killed.

spells.name: Curtain Call
spells.description: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.
spells.tooltip:
Jhin sets up and channels, enabling him to fire 4 super shots at extreme range in a cone in front of him. The shots stop on the first champion hit, slowing it by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage, increased by {{ e5 }}% for each 1% health the target is missing. The 4th shot crits for {{ f1 }}% damage.

If canceled early, Curtain Call's cooldown is refunded by {{ e6 }}% for each unused shot.

spells.name: Switcheroo!
spells.description: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, fire slower, and drain Mana.
spells.tooltip:
Jinx swaps weapons.

Fishbones, the Rocket Launcher: Basic attacks deal 110% Damage to Jinx's target and all nearby enemies, gain {{ e3 }} range, fire {{ e5 }}% slower, and drain Mana.

Pow-Pow, the Minigun: Basic attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for 2.5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 3 times for a total bonus of {{ f4 }}% (bonus scales with spell rank and Jinx's level). Stacks fall off one at a time and only benefit Jinx's first attack after switching to Rocket Launcher.

spells.name: Zap!
spells.description: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.
spells.tooltip: Jinx fires a shock blast that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit, revealing it if it is not stealthed and slowing it by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Flame Chompers!
spells.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.
spells.tooltip: Jinx tosses out 3 chompers that, once armed, explode on contact with enemy champions, rooting the target for 1.5 seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 1.5 seconds to nearby enemies. Chompers last for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
spells.description: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.
spells.tooltip: Jinx fires a rocket that gains damage over the first second it travels. It explodes on the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Physical Damage plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's missing Health. Nearby enemies take 80% Damage.

spells.name: Pierce
spells.description: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
spells.tooltip:
Hurl a fast but narrow projectile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Triggers Martial Poise (P), Sentinel (W), and Rend (E).

If it kills a target, Pierce continues onward, passing all stacks of Rend to the next target.

spells.name: Sentinel
spells.description:
Passively deal bonus damage when striking the same target as the Oathsworn ally.

Activate to send a soul to patrol a path, revealing the area in front of it.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: When Kalista and her Oathsworn both basic attack the same target, she deals {{ e2 }}% of their max health as magic damage. {{ e7 }} second cooldown per target.

Active: Send a soul Sentinel to patrol an unseen area. Champions they see are revealed for 4 seconds. Sentinels last 7 laps.

Kalista gains a charge of Sentinel every {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Rend
spells.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.
spells.tooltip:
While off cooldown, Kalista's spears pierce their target, lingering for 4 seconds.

Active: Rip the spears from nearby targets, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds. Each extra spear increases Rend's damage.

If Rend kills at least one target, its cooldown is reset.
If Rend kills two or more targets, its mana cost is refunded.

spells.name: Fate's Call
spells.description: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.
spells.tooltip:
Draw Kalista's Oathsworn to her. For up to 4 seconds, the Oathsworn is untargetable but pacified.

They may mouse click to fly toward target position, stopping at the first enemy champion hit, knocking all enemies in a small radius back and placing the Oathsworn at their maximum attack range from the enemy.

Kalista's Oathsworn must be within 1400 units for her to cast this ability.

spells.name: Inner Flame
spells.description:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.
spells.tooltip:
Fires a blast of energy that explodes upon enemy contact, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Soulflare: Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage and leaves a circle of flame at the impact area or upon reaching maximum range, slowing enemies for {{ f3 }}%. After 1.5 seconds the circle erupts, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area.

spells.name: Focused Resolve
spells.description:
Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage over time and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.
spells.tooltip:
Links Karma to target enemy champion or monster, revealing them, and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds, rooting them in place for {{ e2 }} second(s) if the link is not broken.

Mantra Bonus - Renewal: Karma is healed for {{ f1 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) of her missing health. If the link is not broken or the target dies, the root duration is increased by {{ f2 }} second(s) and Karma is healed for {{ f1 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) of her missing health.

spells.name: Inspire
spells.description:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.
spells.tooltip:
Target ally gains a shield, granting {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds and absorbing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Defiance: The shield overflows with energy, absorbing an additional {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) for Karma's target. Allied champions around her target gain shields that absorb up to {{ f2 }}% as much as the initial target's shield. All champions shielded by Defiance gain {{ f3 }}% movement speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Mantra
spells.description: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.
spells.tooltip:
Karma empowers her next ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect.

Soulflare: Deals bonus magic damage and leaves behind a circle of flame, heavily slowing enemies and dealing damage after a brief delay.

Renewal: Karma heals for a portion of her missing health. If the target does not break the link, the root duration is extended and Karma is again healed for a portion of her missing health.

Defiance: Karma's target receives an enhanced shield and allied champions around Karma's target become shielded and gain movement speed.

spells.name: Lay Waste
spells.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip: Creates a delayed blast at Karthus' cursor position. After 0.5 seconds, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each nearby enemy, this deals double damage if it hits only a single unit.

spells.name: Wall of Pain
spells.description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.
spells.tooltip: Creates a wall at target location that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies that pass through the wall have their Magic Resist reduced by {{ e1 }}% and Movement Speed reduced by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds (their Movement Speed gradually recovers over the duration).

spells.name: Defile
spells.description: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.
spells.tooltip:
Toggle Off: When Karthus kills a unit, he restores {{ e2 }} Mana.

Toggle On: Drains {{ cost }} Mana to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies each second.

spells.name: Requiem
spells.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
spells.tooltip: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions (regardless of distance).

spells.name: Null Sphere
spells.description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and interrupting channels.

The excess energy forms around himself, granting a shield that absorbs {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Nether Blade
spells.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks draw energy from the void, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage.

Active: Kassadin charges his Nether Blade, causing his next basic attack to deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage and restore {{ e1 }}% of his missing Mana (increases to {{ e4 }}% against champions).

spells.name: Force Pulse
spells.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
spells.tooltip:
Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity, gaining a charge whenever a spell is cast near him.

Upon reaching 6 charges, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second in a cone in front of him.

spells.name: Riftwalk
spells.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.
spells.tooltip:
Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemy units.

Each subsequent Riftwalk within the next {{ e2 }} seconds doubles the Mana cost and deals an additional {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) magic damage per stack, stacks up to {{ e6 }} times.

spells.name: Bouncing Blades
spells.description: Katarina throws a dagger that bounces from enemy to enemy, dealing magic damage and marking them. Her next spell or basic attack against a marked target will consume the mark and deal additional magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Throws a dagger dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to its target and the 4 closest enemies.

Enemies hit are marked for 4 seconds. Katarina's basic attacks or spells will consume the mark dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage.

spells.name: Sinister Steel
spells.description: Katarina whirls her daggers around her, dealing magic damage to all enemies in the area. If she hits an enemy Champion, Katarina gains a burst of speed for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Whirls daggers in a circle dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If she hits an enemy Champion, Katarina gains {{ e2 }}% movement speed for 1 second.

spells.name: Shunpo
spells.description: Katarina instantly teleports to her target's location and takes reduced damage from enemies for a few seconds. If the target is an enemy, she deals damage.
spells.tooltip:
Teleports to a target's location. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage if the target is an enemy.

After using Shunpo, Katarina takes {{ e2 }}% reduced damage for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Death Lotus
spells.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, throwing daggers with unrivaled speed at up to three nearby Champions. Daggers deal magic damage and reduce self healing on targets hit.
spells.tooltip:
Becomes a flurry of blades, throwing daggers at the closest 3 enemy Champions dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

Daggers apply Grievous Wounds, reducing self healing by 40% for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Reckoning
spells.description: Blasts an enemy unit with angelic force, dealing damage, slowing Movement Speed, and applying Holy Fervor.
spells.tooltip: Blasts a target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, and applying a stack of Holy Fervor.

spells.name: Divine Blessing
spells.description: Blesses a target friendly champion, granting them increased Movement Speed and healing them.
spells.tooltip: Blesses an allied champion, increasing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e3 }} seconds and healing them for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health.

spells.name: Righteous Fury
spells.description: Passive: Grants Kayle on Hit magic Damage.  Activate: Ignite Kayle's sword with a holy flame, granting Kayle a ranged splash attack and bonus magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Kayle's Basic Attacks deal an additional {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage on hit.

Active: Kayle increases her Attack Range by 400 for 10 seconds and the passive bonus is increased to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on hit.

In addition, enemies near her target take {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on attack.

spells.name: Intervention
spells.description: Shields Kayle or an ally for a short time, causing them to be immune to damage.
spells.tooltip: Bathes Kayle's target in a holy light, rendering them immune to all damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Thundering Shuriken
spells.description: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.
spells.tooltip: Throws a shuriken that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

spells.name: Electrical Surge
spells.description: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Every 5 attacks, Kennen deals bonus magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% of his attack damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target.

Active: Sends a surge of electricity through all nearby targets caught in Slicing Maelstrom or afflicted by Mark of the Storm, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Lightning Rush
spells.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units. Any enemy unit he runs through takes damage and gets a Mark of the Storm.
spells.tooltip:
Kennen gains 335 movement speed and ignores unit collision for 2 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to any enemy he passes through. Additionally, Kennen will gain {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

Kennen gains 40 Energy the first time he passes through an enemy.
Lightning Rush deals half damage to minions.

spells.name: Slicing Maelstrom
spells.description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at random nearby enemy champions for magical damage.
spells.tooltip:
Summons a magical storm for {{ e3 }} seconds that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to a random enemy champion near Kennen every .25 seconds.

Slicing Maelstrom can only hit the same champion once every .5 seconds and no more than 3 times in total.

spells.name: Taste Their Fear
spells.description: Kha'Zix passively marks enemies that are isolated from nearby allies. Taste Their Fear deals physical damage to a single target. Damage increased on isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Enlarged Claws, this deals extra bonus damage against isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Marks enemies who are isolated from nearby allies.

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If the target is isolated, the damage is increased to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

Evolved Enlarged Claws: If target is isolated, the damage is increased to {{ f3 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Increases the range of Taste Their Fear and Kha'Zix's basic attacks by {{ e5 }}.

spells.name: Void Spike
spells.description: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that slow and deal physical damage to all nearby enemies. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone and Void Spike's slow effect is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Fires exploding spikes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies ({{ e6 }}% bonus damage to monsters) and slowing them for {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Heals Kha'Zix for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) if he is within the explosion radius.

Evolved Spike Racks: Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone, slowing enemies hit by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. If the target is a champion, Kha'Zix gains vision of them for 2 seconds (does not affect stealthed units).

spells.name: Leap
spells.description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases dramatically. Also, on champion kill or assist, Leap's cooldown resets.
spells.tooltip:
Leaps to a target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Evolved Wings: Increases Leap's range. On champion kill or assist, Leap's cooldown resets.

spells.name: Void Assault
spells.description: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Void Assault stealths Kha'Zix, triggers Unseen Threat, and increases Movement Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Active Camouflage, Void Assault can be cast three times and stealth duration increased.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Ranking up Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities.

Active: Stealths for {{ e1 }} second. Activates Unseen Threat and increases Kha'Zix's Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%. Additionally, Kha'Zix ignores unit collision while stealthed. Void Assault can be cast a second time within {{ e2 }} seconds.

Evolved Active Camouflage: Void Assault can be cast three times and its duration increases to {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Dance of Arrows
spells.description: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
spells.tooltip:
Lamb vaults, firing up to 3 arrows at nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Casting Wolf's Frenzy or vaulting inside of its effect reduces the cooldown of this spell to {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Wolf's Frenzy
spells.description: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: As Kindred move they build stacks of Hunter's Vigor, up to a maximum of 100. At full stacks Lamb's next basic attack drains {{ f1 }} health from the target.

Active: Wolf claims a territory, attacking nearby enemies inside it for {{ e4 }} seconds. Lamb can direct him to targets by attacking them. If Lamb leaves Wolf's territory he will cease attacking and join her.

Wolf's attacks deal physical damage equal to {{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the damage from Mark of the Kindred.

spells.name: Mounting Dread
spells.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
spells.tooltip:
Cripple an enemy, slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e8 }} second.

After Lamb attacks the target twice, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, dealing massive physical damage.

Wolf deals physical damage equal to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) +{{ e4 }}% of the target's maximum health. [Maximum {{ e10 }} vs. monsters]

spells.name: Lamb's Respite
spells.description: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.
spells.tooltip:
Lamb blesses the ground under a friendly champion for {{ e2 }} seconds, creating an area in which no living things, ally or enemy, can die. Upon reaching 10% Health, units become immune to further damage or healing.

When the blessing ends all living things inside heal for {{ e1 }}.

spells.name: Caustic Spittle
spells.description: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time.
spells.tooltip: Launches a corrosive projectile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and shreds its Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
spells.description: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and speed, and they deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
For {{ e3 }} seconds, basic attacks:
  • Gain {{ e1 }} range
    Deal {{ e6 }} plus {{ e2 }}% (+{{ f1 }})% of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage
    Gain {{ e4 }}% Total Attack Speed
    Deal {{ e5 }}% damage to non minions

    • During this time, Kog'Maw's Attack Speed cap is doubled.

spells.name: Void Ooze
spells.description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies hit and leaves a trail on the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemies in it by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Living Artillery
spells.description: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
spells.tooltip:
Fires an artillery shot, dealing magic damage. Each subsequent shot within {{ e4 }} seconds costs {{ e3 }} more Mana (max {{ e5 }}).

Damage:
  • {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) to enemies above 50% Health
    {{ f1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) to enemies at 25% - 50% Health
    {{ f4 }} (+{{ f6 }}) (+{{ f5 }}) to enemies below 25% Health

    • Enemies hit are revealed for {{ e6 }} seconds.

spells.name: Sigil of Malice
spells.description: LeBlanc projects an orb towards her target, dealing magic damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. If the target takes damage from one of LeBlanc's abilities, the sigil will trigger, dealing damage.
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and marks the target for 3.5 seconds.

If the target takes damage from one of LeBlanc's abilities, the mark will trigger, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Distortion
spells.description: LeBlanc rapidly dashes to a target location, dealing magic damage to nearby units. In the following 4 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.
spells.tooltip:
Dashes to a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby units.

For 4 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.

spells.name: Ethereal Chains
spells.description: LeBlanc flings illusionary chains towards a target location. If it hits an enemy unit, it will deal initial magic damage and slow their Movement Speed by 25%. If the target remains shackled for 2 seconds, the target takes additional magic damage and is unable to move.
spells.tooltip:
Launches a chain that shackles the first unit hit to LeBlanc, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 25%.

If the target remains shackled for {{ e2 }} seconds they take an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are unable to move for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Mimic
spells.description: LeBlanc can cast a mimicked version of the previous spell she cast.
spells.tooltip:
LeBlanc can cast a mimicked version of the previous spell she cast.

Mimicked Sigil of Malice and Ethereal Chains deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on both instances of their damage.

Mimicked Distortion deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
spells.description:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage plus 8% of their missing Health.
spells.tooltip:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.

Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage plus 8% of their missing Health (Max: 400 Damage vs. Monsters).

spells.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
spells.description:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes towards a target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 5 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.
spells.tooltip:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes towards a target ally. If the ally is a champion, Lee Sin shields the ally and himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e3 }} seconds and Safeguard's cooldown is reduced by {{ e6 }}%. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.

Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal and Spell Vamp.

spells.name: Tempest / Cripple
spells.description:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies revealed by Tempest, reducing their Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
spells.tooltip:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and reveals enemy units hit for 4 seconds. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast Cripple for the next 3 seconds.

Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies revealed by Tempest for 4 seconds, reducing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

spells.name: Dragon's Rage
spells.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.
spells.tooltip: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching an enemy champion back, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. Every time the target collides with an enemy champion, the target also deals {{ e3 }}% of their bonus health as physical damage.

spells.name: Shield of Daybreak
spells.description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.
spells.tooltip: The next basic attack deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stuns an enemy for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Eclipse
spells.description: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resistance. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.
spells.tooltip: Gains {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) bonus Armor and {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds. When the effect ends, nearby enemies struck take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and Leona retains her bonus Armor and Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Zenith Blade
spells.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.
spells.tooltip: Strikes all enemies in a line dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The last enemy Champion struck will be briefly rooted and Leona will dash to them.

spells.name: Solar Flare
spells.description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed.
spells.tooltip: Calls down a radiant beam of solar energy dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the flare are stunned instead of slowed.

spells.name: Ice Shard
spells.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.
spells.tooltip: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Shards then pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

spells.name: Ring of Frost
spells.description: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and roots them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Glacial Path
spells.description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
spells.tooltip: Casts an ice claw that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies hit. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

spells.name: Frozen Tomb
spells.description: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Movement Speed.
spells.tooltip:
On Enemy Cast: Freezes target champion solid, stunning it for {{ e4 }} seconds.

On Self Cast: Lissandra encases herself in dark ice for {{ e5 }} seconds, healing for {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}), increased for 1% for each 1% Health she is missing, and becoming untargetable and invulnerable but unable to take any actions.

Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The ice lasts for {{ e3 }} seconds and slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Piercing Light
spells.description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.
spells.tooltip: Shoots a bolt of piercing light through an enemy unit, damaging enemies in a line for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of bonus Attack Damage) physical damage.

spells.name: Ardent Blaze
spells.description: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Fires a shot that explodes upon enemy contact or reaching the end of its path. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and marks enemies for 6 seconds.

When Lucian or his allies damage a marked target, Lucian gains {{ e2 }} Movement Speed for 1 second.

spells.name: Relentless Pursuit
spells.description: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.
spells.tooltip:
Quickly dashes a short distance.

Whenever Lightslinger hits an enemy, Relentless Pursuit's cooldown is reduced by {{ e1 }} second (doubles to {{ e2 }} seconds against champions).

spells.name: The Culling
spells.description: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.
spells.tooltip:
Lucian moves freely while firing rapidly in a single direction for {{ e1 }} seconds. His shots collide with the first enemy they hit and each do {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage. The Culling does 400% damage to minions.

Lucian may use Relentless Pursuit during The Culling.

Reactivate The Culling to cancel early.

spells.name: Glitterlance
spells.description: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.
spells.tooltip:
Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, slowing enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second(s). This slow decays over time.

An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.

spells.name: Whimsy
spells.description: If cast on an ally, grants them Movement Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.
spells.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Target ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }})% Movement Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Polymorphs an enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds, disabling their ability to attack or cast spells and reducing their base Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}.

spells.name: Help, Pix!
spells.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.
spells.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Commands Pix to jump to an ally and then follow and aid their attacks instead of Lulu's for {{ e1 }} seconds. If the ally is a champion, Pix shields them from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Pix deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to target enemy unit. Pix then follows and grants vision of them for {{ e6 }} seconds.

spells.name: Wild Growth
spells.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip: Lulu enlarges her ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air. For {{ e4 }} seconds, her ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus health and slows nearby enemies by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Light Binding
spells.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.
spells.tooltip: Fires a ball of light, rooting up to two enemies for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each.

spells.name: Prismatic Barrier
spells.description: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.
spells.tooltip: Throws Lux's wand to a target location and back, protecting herself and all allied Champions it touches from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Lucent Singularity
spells.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
spells.tooltip:
Creates a zone that slows enemies by {{ e1 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds the zone detonates dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activate again to detonate early.

spells.name: Final Spark
spells.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
spells.tooltip: Fires a dazzling ray of light dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line. Final Spark ignites and refreshes the Illumination debuff.

spells.name: Seismic Shard
spells.description: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and steals {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed from the target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Brutal Strikes
spells.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite's armor is increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

Active: Basic attacks deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and any nearby units. Lasts {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Ground Slam
spells.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.
spells.tooltip:
Malphite slams the ground dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e3 }}% of Malphite's Armor.

spells.name: Unstoppable Force
spells.description: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.
spells.tooltip: Malphite charges toward the target area, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and knocking enemies into the air for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Call of the Void
spells.description: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.
spells.tooltip: Malzahar opens two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and silence champions for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Null Zone
spells.description: Malzahar creates a zone of negative energy which damages enemies that stand in it.
spells.tooltip: Malzahar creates a zone of negative energy for {{ e3 }} seconds. The zone damages nearby enemies for {{ e1 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their max Health each second (damage to monsters is capped at {{ e4 }} damage per second).

spells.name: Malefic Visions
spells.description: Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage each second. If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.
spells.tooltip:
Malzahar infects his target's mind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 4 seconds.

If the target dies during this time, the visions pass to a nearby enemy and Malzahar gains {{ e2 }} Mana.

Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.

spells.name: Nether Grasp
spells.description: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion and deal damage each second.
spells.tooltip: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress target champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 2.5 seconds.

spells.name: Arcane Smash
spells.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
spells.tooltip: Maokai releases an arcane shockwave. Nearby enemies are knocked back and all affected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Twisted Advance
spells.description: Maokai dissolves into a cloud of arcane energies. He regrows near a target enemy, dealing damage and rooting it in place.
spells.tooltip: Maokai transforms into a cloud of arcane energy that quickly travels to a target enemy, roots it for {{ e2 }} second(s) and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of the target's maximum health as magic damage (Max: {{ e3 }} to minions and monsters).

spells.name: Sapling Toss
spells.description: Maokai flings a sapling that deals area damage on impact. The sapling then wards the nearby area. When enemies approach, the sapling attacks enemies with an arcane blast.
spells.tooltip:
Maokai flings a sapling that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on impact.

The sapling wards the nearby area, and will chase enemies that approach, exploding to deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slow enemies hit by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e3 }} second(s). Saplings last for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Vengeful Maelstrom
spells.description: Maokai shields his allies by drawing power from hostile spells and attacks, reducing non-tower damage done to allied champions in the area. When Maokai ends the effect, he unleashes the absorbed energy to deal damage to enemies within the vortex.
spells.tooltip:
Toggle: Maokai surrounds himself with a magical vortex that protects him and allied champions by reducing damage from non-turret sources by {{ e1 }}% for up to {{ e2 }} seconds.

Maokai can end the effect to release the stored energy, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+2 per damage absorbed) magic damage to enemies within the vortex. Maokai can store up to {{ e5 }} bonus damage.
spells.resource: {{ cost }} Mana, {{ e4 }} Mana Per Second

spells.name: Alpha Strike
spells.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to minions and monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
spells.tooltip:
Master Yi teleports to strike up to 4 enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to each and an additional {{ e3 }} damage to minions and monsters, while simultaneously becoming untargetable.

Alpha Strike can critically strike, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} physical damage. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Alpha Strike by 1 second.

spells.name: Meditate
spells.description: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time.
spells.tooltip:
Master Yi channels, restoring {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health per second for 4 seconds. This healing is increased by 1% for every 1% of Master Yi's missing Health.

While channeling, Master Yi reduces incoming damage by {{ e3 }}%. This damage reduction is halved against turrets.

spells.name: Wuju Style
spells.description: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}) Attack Damage.

Active: Basic attacks deal bonus {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) true damage for {{ e5 }} seconds. Afterwards the passive bonus is lost while Wuju Style is on cooldown.

spells.name: Highlander
spells.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extends Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Champion kills and assists reduce the remaining cooldown of Master Yi's basic abilities by 70%.

Active: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%, Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}%, and grants immunity to all slowing effects for {{ e1 }} seconds. While active, champion kills and assists extend the duration of Highlander by {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Double Up
spells.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.
spells.tooltip:
Miss Fortune fires a bouncing shot through an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first target and {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) damage to the second. Both apply on-hit effects.

If the first shot kills its target, the second deals 50% increased damage.

spells.name: Strut
spells.description: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a duration that prolongs with successive Love Taps.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: After 5 seconds of not taking direct damage, Miss Fortune gains {{ e5 }} Movement Speed. After another 5 seconds, this bonus increases to {{ e2 }}.

Active: Fully activates Strut's Movement Speed and grants {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Love Taps prolong the Attack Speed bonus duration by {{ e4 }} second(s) (doubled vs. champions).

spells.name: Make It Rain
spells.description: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.
spells.tooltip: Miss Fortune reveals an area, raining down bullets that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds and slow enemies hit by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Bullet Time
spells.description: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Bullet Time can critically strike.
spells.tooltip:
Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets for {{ e3 }} seconds, dealing (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage per wave ({{ e2 }} waves total).

Bullet Time can critically strike for {{ f3 }}% damage.

Total Damage: {{ f2 }}

spells.name: Crushing Blow
spells.description: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Wukong's next attack gains {{ e4 }} Attack Range, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and reduces the enemy's Armor by {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Decoy
spells.description: Wukong becomes invisible for 1.5 seconds. An uncontrollable decoy is left behind that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it after 1.5 seconds.
spells.tooltip: Wukong becomes invisible for 1.5 seconds. An uncontrollable decoy is left behind that will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies near it after 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Nimbus Strike
spells.description: Wukong dashes toward a target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.
spells.tooltip: Wukong dashes toward a target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to each enemy struck. Upon hitting his target, Wukong gains {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Cyclone
spells.description: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.
spells.tooltip: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage per second and knocking up enemies he encounters. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell. Lasts 4 seconds.

spells.name: Mace of Spades
spells.description: Mordekaiser's next three attacks deal escalating bonus damage.
spells.tooltip: Mordekaiser's next three hits are empowered. The first two strikes deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) bonus magic damage. The final strike deals {{ e9 }} times the bonus damage of the previous strikes, up to {{ f5 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f4 }}).

spells.name: Harvesters of Sorrow
spells.description: Coats an ally in magnetic metal, increasing each unit's movement speed toward one another. While near one another, the metal swirls violently dealing damage per second to enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Mordekaiser gains bonus experience for killing Minions near allies (bonus is {{ e9 }}% of the experience lost from sharing).

Bonus Experience Earned: {{ f3 }}

Active: Target an ally, linking them to Mordekaiser:

  • Both gain up to {{ e5 }} movement speed toward one another.

    When they touch, they deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds to nearby enemies.

    Reactivate to both instantly steal {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health from nearby enemies ({{ e7 }}% heal on minions, max {{ e8 }} units; deals magic damage).

spells.name: Siphon of Destruction
spells.description: Mordekaiser deals damage to enemies in a cone in front of him. For each unit hit, Mordekaiser's shield absorbs energy.
spells.tooltip:
Mordekaiser deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone.

For each Champion hit, he gains {{ e5 }}% maximum shield.

spells.name: Children of the Grave
spells.description: Mordekaiser curses an enemy champion or the Dragon, stealing a percent of their life initially and each second. If the target dies while the spell is active, their soul is enslaved and will follow Mordekaiser as a ghost.
spells.tooltip:
Passive - Dragon Force: Damaging the Dragon will Curse it for 10 seconds.

Active: Curse target Champion and steal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum health (25% initially, 75% over 10 seconds; deals magic damage).

Curse Effect: When killed by Mordekaiser's team, the Cursed unit's soul will follow Mordekaiser for {{ e9 }} seconds.

Mordekaiser gains {{ e7 }}% of their ability power and {{ e8 }}% of their bonus health.

The ghost gains (+{{ f1 }}) attack damage and (+{{ f2 }}) health.

The ghost can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

spells.name: Dark Binding
spells.description: Morgana releases a sphere of dark magic. Upon contact with an enemy unit, the sphere will deal magic damage and force the unit to the ground for a period of time.
spells.tooltip: Fires a bolt of dark energy, rooting the first enemy hit for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Tormented Soil
spells.description: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.
spells.tooltip:
Curses an area for 5 seconds. Enemies on the cursed ground are dealt
from {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every second based on the enemy's missing Health.

spells.name: Black Shield
spells.description: Places a protective barrier around an allied champion, absorbing magical damage and disables until penetrated or the shield dissipates.
spells.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion for {{ e2 }} seconds. The shield absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and prevents disables until it breaks.

spells.name: Soul Shackles
spells.description: Latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions, dealing initial damage to them and slowing their Movement Speed, and then echoing the pain a few seconds later and stunning them if they remain close to Morgana.
spells.tooltip:
Dark chains latch onto nearby enemy Champions dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing them by 20% for 3 seconds. After 3 seconds, they are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Enemy Champions can break the chains by moving away from Morgana.

spells.name: Aqua Prison
spells.description: Sends a bubble towards a targeted area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
spells.tooltip: Sends a bubble towards a targeted area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, and stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Ebb and Flow
spells.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allies and enemies, healing allies and damaging enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allies and enemies.

On Ally Hit: Heals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Health and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.

On Enemy Hit: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and bounces to a nearby allied champion.

Bounces to each target only once, and hits up to {{ e2 }} targets. The damage and healing value is modified by ({{ f1 }}%) each bounce.

spells.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
spells.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
spells.tooltip: Empowers an allied champion for {{ e5 }} seconds or {{ e4 }} basic attacks. The ally's basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and slow the target by {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e3 }} second.

spells.name: Tidal Wave
spells.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
spells.tooltip:
Summons a Tidal Wave from Nami's position. The wave knocks up enemies and slows them by {{ e4 }}%, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The duration of the slow increases based on how far the Tidal Wave has traveled, with a minimum duration of 2 seconds and a maximum of {{ e5 }} seconds.

Allies hit by the wave gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

spells.name: Siphoning Strike
spells.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Nasus's next basic attack has {{ e3 }} additional Attack Range (does not stack with range from Fury of the Sands) and will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Passive: Siphoning Strike permanently gains {{ e2 }} damage if it kills an enemy unit. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.

spells.name: Wither
spells.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.
spells.tooltip: Nasus ages target champion over {{ e3 }} seconds, initially slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and increasing to {{ e1 }}% over the duration. The target's Attack Speed is reduced by half the amount.

spells.name: Spirit Fire
spells.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.
spells.tooltip:
Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a target location, dealing an initial {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, enemies in the area have their Armor reduced by {{ e2 }} and are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second.

spells.name: Fury of the Sands
spells.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, and drains nearby enemies' max Health converting into bonus damage for the duration.
spells.tooltip:
Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by {{ e1 }} and Attack Range by {{ e2 }}.

While the storm rages, he deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of nearby enemies' maximum Health each second ({{ e5 }} damage max per second) as magic damage and converts it into bonus Attack Damage.

spells.name: Dredge Line
spells.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor and the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half.
spells.tooltip:
Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy unit, Nautilus drags himself and the target together dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them briefly.

If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself forward and the cooldown is reduced by {{ e3 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

spells.name: Titan's Wrath
spells.description: Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies, gaining a shield that blocks incoming damage. While the shield persists, his attacks apply a damage over time effect to enemies around his target.
spells.tooltip:
Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies for {{ e3 }} seconds, shielding him from the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of his max Health) damage.

While the shield persists, Nautilus' basic attacks deal {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage over 2 seconds to all units around his target.

spells.name: Riptide
spells.description: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him. Each explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to units in the area and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. This slow diminishes over time.

A unit can be hit by more than one explosion, but they take {{ e3 }}% less damage from additional explosions.

spells.name: Depth Charge
spells.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
spells.tooltip:
Nautilus fires a shockwave that chases an enemy champion. This deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies it passes through and knocks them into the air.

The shockwave explodes upon hitting its target dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, launching them into the air and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
spells.description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.
spells.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee tosses her javelin, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. If it exceeds her basic attack range, it gains damage based on distance flown, up to a potential {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) total damage.

Cougar: Nidalee's next attack deals additional damage, greatly increased on low health targets.

spells.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
spells.description: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
spells.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee lays a Bushwhack trap lasting up to 2 minutes. When sprung by an enemy, it is revealed and takes {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds.

Cougar: Nidalee lunges toward a target area, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

spells.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
spells.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
spells.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee heals a target ally champion for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) and grants them {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed for 7 seconds.

Cougar: Nidalee claws at enemies in a target direction.

spells.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
spells.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.
spells.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee transforms into a vicious cougar with the basic abilities Takedown, Pounce, and Swipe.

Cougar: Nidalee transforms back into human form. While in human form, triggering a Hunt resets the cooldown of Aspect of the Cougar.

spells.name: Duskbringer
spells.description: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Movement Speed and Attack Damage.
spells.tooltip:
Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and leaves a Dusk Trail for {{ e3 }} seconds. Enemy champions hit also leave a Dusk Trail.

While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and {{ e4 }} Attack Damage.

spells.name: Shroud of Darkness
spells.description: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne has {{ e1 }}% bonus Attack Speed.

Active: Nocturne creates a magical barrier for 1.5 seconds, which blocks the next enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Nocturne's passive Attack Speed bonus doubles for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Unspeakable Horror
spells.description: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and terrifying the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne gains massively increased Movement Speed toward terrified enemies.

Active: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds. If Nocturne stays within range of the target for the full duration, the target becomes terrified for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Paranoia
spells.description: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.
spells.tooltip:
Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision for 4 seconds.

While Paranoia is active, Nocturne can launch himself at an enemy champion, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

spells.name: Consume
spells.description: Nunu commands the yeti to take a bite out of a target minion or monster, dealing heavy damage to it and healing himself.
spells.tooltip:
Commands the yeti to bite out of a minion or monster, dealing {{ e1 }} true damage to the target and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}).

Nunu gains bonuses for {{ e3 }} seconds based on what he consumed.

Elementals: Increased Size and {{ f3 }}% Maximum Health
Animals or Undead: Killing a unit grants {{ f4 }}% Movement Speed for 3 seconds
Other Monsters: Nunu's attacks and spells deal an additional {{ f5 }}% of his Maximum Health as magic damage.

spells.name: Blood Boil
spells.description: Nunu invigorates himself and an allied unit by heating their blood, increasing their Movement and Attack Speeds.
spells.tooltip:
The heat of Nunu and a target ally's blood rises, increasing Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If Nunu targets himself, Blood Boil will try to target the nearest Ally champion.

spells.name: Ice Blast
spells.description: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing damage and temporarily slowing their Movement and Attack Speeds.
spells.tooltip: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Absolute Zero
spells.description: Nunu begins to sap the area of heat, slowing all nearby enemies. When the spell ends, he deals massive damage to all enemies caught in the area.
spells.tooltip:
Nunu saps the area of heat, channeling up to {{ e4 }} seconds, slowing surrounding enemy units' Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e3 }}%.

Enemies caught in the area when the channel ends receive up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, depending on how long the spell was channeled.
(Minimum Damage: {{ f2 }})

spells.name: Undertow
spells.description: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to units it passes through and slowing their Movement Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Olaf throws an axe to a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to units it passes through and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for up to {{ e3 }} seconds. The further the Axe flies, the longer the slow lasts, but it is never less than {{ e4 }} second.

If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.

spells.name: Vicious Strikes
spells.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Life Steal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much Health he is missing.
spells.tooltip:
For 6 seconds, Olaf gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal and Attack Speed is increased by {{ e1 }}%.

During this time, Olaf also receives 1% increased healing from all sources for every {{ e3 }}% of Health he is missing.

spells.name: Reckless Swing
spells.description: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.
spells.tooltip:
Olaf ferociously swings his axes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage to his target. This ability's cost is equal to {{ e2 }}% of the total damage dealt, but the cost is refunded if it kills the target.

Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Reckless Swing by 1 second.

spells.name: Ragnarok
spells.description: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Olaf gains {{ e1 }} Armor and {{ e1 }} Magic Resist.

Active: Olaf removes all disables from himself and becomes immune to them for the next {{ e2 }} seconds. Olaf also receives a {{ e5 }}% Movement Speed bonus towards enemy champions for {{ e4 }} second. During this time, Olaf loses the passive portion of Ragnarok and gains {{ e3 }} Attack Damage.

spells.name: Command: Attack
spells.description: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.
spells.tooltip:
Orianna commands her Ball to shoot toward a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to targets along the way. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (Minimum {{ e3 }}%).

Her Ball remains behind at the target location afterwards.

spells.name: Command: Dissonance
spells.description: Orianna commands the Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Orianna commands her Ball to release an electric pulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

The pulse leaves behind an energy field for {{ e4 }} seconds, lowering enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and increasing ally Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds. This effect diminishes over time.

spells.name: Command: Protect
spells.description: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: The Ball adds {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist to the allied champion it is attached to.

Active: Orianna commands her Ball to travel to and attach onto an allied champion, shielding them for {{ e5 }} seconds from the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Enemies the Ball passes through along the way are damaged for {{ e4 }}% of the shield value: {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

spells.name: Command: Shockwave
spells.description: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the Ball after a short delay.
spells.tooltip: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave after a brief delay, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and flinging them into the air a set distance in the direction of the Ball.

spells.name: Spear Shot
spells.description: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing damage.
spells.tooltip: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

spells.name: Aegis of Zeonia
spells.description: Pantheon leaps at an enemy and bashes the enemy with his shield, stunning them. After finishing the attack, Pantheon readies himself to block the next attack.
spells.tooltip: Pantheon leaps at the target enemy champion, minion or neutral monster and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stuns them for {{ e2 }} second(s). Pantheon also instantly refreshes his Aegis Protection.

spells.name: Heartseeker Strike
spells.description: Pantheon focuses and unleashes 3 swift strikes to the area in front of him, dealing double damage to champions. Pantheon also becomes more aware of his enemy's vital spots, allowing him to always crit enemies below 15% Health.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Pantheon's basic attacks and Spear Shot gain 100% critical strike chance against targets below {{ e3 }}% Health.

Active: Pantheon focuses and delivers {{ e4 }} swift strikes in front of him for a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage (deals {{ e2 }}% damage to minions and monsters).

Damage per Strike: {{ f1 }}

spells.name: Grand Skyfall
spells.description: Pantheon composes himself then leaps into the air to a target, striking all enemy units in an area. Enemies closer to the impact point take more damage.
spells.tooltip:
Pantheon gathers his strength and then leaps high into the air, crashing down at the target area a few seconds later. Deals up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to units at the center (down to {{ e3 }}% at the edge) and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for 1 second.

If Pantheon cancels this channel, Grand Skyfall is put on a {{ e5 }} second cooldown.

spells.name: Hammer Shock
spells.description: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.
spells.tooltip:
Poppy smashes the ground, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e5 }}% of the enemies' maximum Health as physical damage, and leaving an unstable area.

The area slows enemies inside it by {{ e3 }}% and erupts after {{ e4 }} second, dealing the initial damage again.

spells.name: Steadfast Presence
spells.description: Poppy stops enemy dashes around her and gains movement speed.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Poppy gains {{ f1 }} Armor and {{ f2 }} Magic Resist ({{ e3 }}% of Armor and Magic Resist). This bonus is doubled if Poppy is below 40% Health.

Active: For the next {{ e1 }} seconds, Poppy gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed. While Steadfast Presence is active, she stops enemy dashes in an area around her, dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Heroic Charge
spells.description: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.
spells.tooltip: Poppy tackles an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and carrying them forward. If Poppy carries the target into terrain, the enemy takes {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) additional physical damage and is stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Keeper's Verdict
spells.description: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.
spells.tooltip:
First Cast: Poppy channels for up to {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing herself by {{ e7 }}%.

Second Cast: Poppy smashes the ground, emanating a shockwave that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies around the first champion hit and knocking them a large distance toward their Summoning Platform. The shockwave length and knockback distance increases with channel duration.

Enemies are untargetable while they are being knocked away.

spells.name: Blinding Assault
spells.description: Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area.
spells.tooltip:
Valor flies in a line, marking the first enemy he hits as Vulnerable and reducing its vision radius dramatically for {{ e3 }} seconds. He then deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies.

If the primary target is not a champion, it cannot attack for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Heightened Senses
spells.description: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Movement Speed after she attacks a Vulnerable target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Attacking a Vulnerable target increases Attack Speed and Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Active: Valor reveals a large area nearby for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Vault
spells.description: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target.
spells.tooltip:
Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage while Valor marks it as Vulnerable.

Upon reaching the target, Quinn leaps off, briefly displacing and slowing it by {{ e1 }}% (diminishing over {{ e3 }} seconds).

spells.name: Behind Enemy Lines
spells.description: Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.
spells.tooltip:
Quinn calls down Valor to assist her. After a 2 second channel, they unite, gaining {{ e3 }}% Total Movement Speed and the ability to cast Skystrike by ending Behind Enemy Lines or taking offensive action.

Taking champion or turret damage puts Behind Enemy Lines on a 3 second cooldown.

spells.name: Powerball
spells.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
spells.tooltip:
Rammus accelerates in a ball over {{ e4 }} seconds towards his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies on impact, knocking them back, and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Activating Defensive Ball Curl will remove this effect after 1 second.

spells.name: Defensive Ball Curl
spells.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resist, while returning damage to attacks.
spells.tooltip:
Rammus goes into a defensive formation for {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }} and returning {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to attackers.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e4 }}% of Armor.

Activating Powerball will remove this effect after 1 second.

spells.name: Puncturing Taunt
spells.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against Rammus' hard shell, reducing Armor temporarily.
spells.tooltip: Rammus taunts the enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault, reducing their Armor by {{ e2 }} and forcing them to attack Rammus for {{ e1 }} second(s).

spells.name: Tremors
