spells.description: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to units and structures near him.
spells.tooltip: Rammus creates tremors beneath him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every second to nearby units and structures for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
spells.description:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Magic Damage and reveals enemies hit.
spells.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks within 5 seconds deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

Burrowed: Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that explodes on first unit hit, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage and revealing non-stealthed enemies hit for {{ e6 }} seconds.

spells.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
spells.description:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Burrow into the ground.

Burrowed: Un-burrow, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage and knocking up nearby enemies for up to 1 second based on their proximity to Rek'Sai. A unit cannot be hit by Un-burrow more than once every {{ e6 }} seconds.

Burrowed Effects: New abilities, +{{ f1 }} Movement Speed, reduced vision range, disabled basic attacks, and gains Tremor Sense: Nearby enemies that move in Fog of War have their position revealed to Rek'Sai and her allies.

spells.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
spells.description:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing increased damage based on her Fury. Deals True Damage at max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
spells.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai bites a target dealing {{ f1 }} Physical Damage, increasing by up to 100% at maximum Fury. If Rek'Sai has 100 Fury, Furious Bite deals True Damage.

Maximum Damage: {{ f2 }}

Burrowed: Rek'Sai tunnels forward leaving two connected Tunnel Entrances. Clicking a Tunnel Entrance will make Rek'Sai dive to the other entrance.

Tunnel Entrances last for {{ e5 }} minutes and can be destroyed by enemies. Rek'Sai may have {{ e6 }} tunnels at one time. Tunnels have a {{ e8 }} second cooldown on use.

spells.name: Void Rush
spells.description: Rek'Sai travels at incredible speed to a targeted Tunnel Entrance.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: After channeling for 1.5 seconds, Rek'Sai becomes untargetable while travelling to target Tunnel Entrance. Taking damage from a champion or tower will interrupt the channel.

spells.name: Cull the Meek
spells.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
spells.tooltip:
Renekton swings his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Health for each non-champion hit and {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) Health for each champion hit, up to {{ e4 }} Health.

He generates 2.5 Fury for each non-champion hit and 10 Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of 30 Fury.

50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}). Heal increased to {{ e7 }} (+{{ f4 }}) per non-champion and {{ f5 }} (+{{ f6 }}) per champion, up to {{ e9 }}. No longer generates Fury.

spells.name: Ruthless Predator
spells.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Renekton's next attack strikes twice, stunning his target for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage per hit ({{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total damage).

Each hit applies on-hit effects and generates Fury. Renekton generates an additional {{ e7 }} Fury for hitting a champion.

50 Fury Bonus: Renekton attacks three times, stunning his target for {{ e4 }} seconds and dealing a total of {{ e6 }} (+{{ f3 }}) damage. No longer generates Fury.

spells.name: Slice and Dice
spells.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
spells.tooltip:
Slice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Hitting an enemy grants the ability to use Dice for 4 seconds.

Dice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

He generates {{ e4 }} Fury for each non-champion hit and {{ e5 }} Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of 30 Fury.

Dice - 50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Enemies hit have {{ e2 }}% reduced Armor for 4 seconds. No longer generates Fury.

spells.name: Dominus
spells.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
spells.tooltip: Renekton surrounds himself with dark energies for 15 seconds, gaining {{ e1 }} Health. While active, he deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and gains 5 Fury per second.

spells.name: Savagery
spells.description:
Rengar's next basic attack deals bonus damage.
Ferocity effect: Rengar deals enhanced damage and grants him Attack Speed and Attack Damage.
spells.tooltip:
The next basic attack within 3 seconds deals {{ e4 }}% ({{ f3 }}) of Rengar's Attack Damage plus {{ e1 }} physical damage.

Ferocity effect: The next basic attack within 3 seconds deals 130% {{ f1 }} of Rengar's Attack Damage plus {{ f2 }} physical damage and grants {{ f4 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e6 }}% Attack Damage for {{ e3 }} seconds (Damage and Attack Speed scale with Rengar's level).

spells.name: Battle Roar
spells.description:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and gaining bonus Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
Ferocity effect: Rengar heals for a large amount.
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area. Rengar's Armor and Magic Resist are increased by {{ e3 }} for {{ e6 }} seconds. The bonus Armor and Magic Resist is increased by {{ e7 }}% for each enemy Champion or large Monster hit.

Ferocity effect: Deals {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area, grants the defenses from the normal ability, and restores between {{ f1 }} and {{ f3 }} Health based on missing Health (healing and damage values scale with Rengar's level).

spells.name: Bola Strike
spells.description:
Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.
Ferocity effect: Roots the target.
spells.tooltip:
Throws a bola dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing an enemy by {{ e3 }}% for 2.5 seconds. This slow diminishes over time.

Ferocity effect: Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and roots the target for {{ e5 }} seconds on top of the normal slow (damage scales with Rengar's level).

spells.name: Thrill of the Hunt
spells.description: Rengar activates his predatory instincts, stealthing himself and revealing all enemy Champions in a large radius around him. While stealthed, he gains Movement Speed and his next attack will cause him to leap. He gains Movement Speed and rapidly generates Ferocity after he breaks stealth.
spells.tooltip:
Rengar stealths himself for {{ e5 }} seconds after a 1 second (delayed to 3 seconds if taking damage) delay and reveals enemy Champions within {{ e3 }} range. While stealthed, Rengar gains {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed when moving toward enemy champions and his next attack will cause him to leap.

After breaking stealth, Rengar gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and generates 5 Ferocity over {{ e7 }} seconds.

spells.name: Broken Wings
spells.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Riven strikes out in front of her in a short line. This ability may be reactivated {{ e4 }} additional times.

1st and 2nd Use: Slashes forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all units she comes in contact with.
3rd Use: Leaps forward and slams the ground dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocking nearby enemies up. This leap can cross unpathable terrain.

Riven will target the unit your cursor is hovering over, or if no targets are present, Riven will simply strike the direction she is currently facing.

spells.name: Ki Burst
spells.description: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip: Riven's sword emits a burst of runic energy that shocks nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Valor
spells.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
spells.tooltip: Riven does a quick dash in the direction of your cursor and becomes shielded, blocking up to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) incoming damage for 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Blade of the Exile
spells.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.
spells.tooltip:
Riven's weapon surges with spiritual energy for {{ e4 }} seconds, granting her {{ e5 }}% extra Attack Damage (+{{ f3 }}), increased Range on her damaging spells and attacks, and the ability to use Wind Slash once.

Wind Slash: Riven fires a shockwave that deals from {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all enemies hit, increasing based on how much Health they are missing.

spells.name: Flamespitter
spells.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble torches his opponents, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone over 3 seconds. This spell deals half damage to minions.

Danger Zone Bonus: Deals 50% bonus damage.

spells.name: Scrap Shield
spells.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble tosses up a shield for 2 seconds that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Rumble also gains an additional {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for 1 second.

Danger Zone Bonus: 50% increase in shield health and Movement Speed.

spells.name: Electro Harpoon
spells.description: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble shoots his opponent with up to 2 tasers, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applying a stacking slow of {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

Danger Zone Bonus: Damage and slow percentage increased by 50%.

spells.name: The Equalizer
spells.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail for 5 seconds. Enemies in the area have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ e3 }}% and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second.

You can control the placement of this attack by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

spells.name: Overload
spells.description: Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. Additionally, Arcane Mastery's supercharged duration is passively increased.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Arcane Mastery's supercharged duration is increased to {{ e3 }} seconds.

Active: Fires an orb, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to the first target hit.

spells.name: Rune Prison
spells.description: Ryze traps a target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving.
spells.tooltip: Instantly roots a target for {{ e1 }} second(s), dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Spell Flux
spells.description: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that bounces from the initial target to nearby enemies and Ryze before bouncing back to the initial target. Enemies hit are damaged and have their Magic Resist reduced.
spells.tooltip:
Unleashes an orb that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and reduces the Magic Resist of its target by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

After hitting, Spell Flux bounces to nearby enemies and Ryze (up to {{ e6 }} secondary targets) before returning to the original target. Instances of damage on the original target after the first deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) damage.

spells.name: Desperate Power
spells.description: Ryze channels immense arcane power to gain Movement Speed, Spell Vamp, and area of effect damage on his spells. He also passively gains Cooldown Reduction and increases the duration of Arcane Mastery's supercharged effect.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Ryze gains {{ e8 }}% Cooldown Reduction.

Active: Ryze gains {{ e1 }} Movement Speed and {{ e4 }}% Spell Vamp for {{ e10 }} seconds. During this time, Ryze's spells deal {{ e5 }}% additional damage to enemies near his targets.

spells.name: Arctic Assault
spells.description: Charges forward, dealing magic damage and knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after knocking an enemy champion into the air.
spells.tooltip: Charges forward, knocking enemies into the air and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The charge stops after knocking an enemy champion into the air.

spells.name: Flail of the Northern Winds
spells.description: Sejuani's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage to the target and enemies near it. She then spins her flail, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Sejuani's next basic attack also affects enemies near her target. All affected units are dealt magic damage equal to {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of their own maximum Health. Sejuani then swings her flail, dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies over 4 seconds.

If this ability is reactivated, Sejuani immediately starts swinging her flail.

spells.name: Permafrost
spells.description: Abilities and basic attacks apply Frost to enemies. Activating Permafrost damages and slows all nearby enemies with Frost.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Abilities and basic attacks apply Frost to enemies for 4 seconds.

Active: All nearby enemies with Frost take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Glacial Prison
spells.description: Sejuani throws her True Ice bola in a line. If the bola hits an enemy champion, it shatters, stunning the target and nearby enemies. If the bola reaches its maximum range, it shatters and slows nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Sejuani throws her True Ice bola in a line. If the bola hits an enemy champion, it shatters, stunning the target and nearby enemies for {{ e2 }} seconds. If the bola reaches its maximum range, it shatters and slows enemies by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds instead.

All enemies in the shatter area take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Deceive
spells.description: Shaco becomes invisible and teleports to target location. His next attack is guaranteed to critically strike.
spells.tooltip:
Shaco teleports nearby and becomes invisible for 3.5 seconds.

His next basic attack within the next 6 seconds will critically strike, dealing {{ e1 }}% damage (normal critical strikes deal {{ e2 }}% damage).

spells.name: Jack In The Box
spells.description: Shaco creates an invisible, animated Jack-in-the-Box, which will fear, and then attack, nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Shaco creates a Jack in the Box at the target location. It will become invisible after 2 seconds, and pop out when an enemy comes near, fearing nearby enemies for {{ e3 }} seconds and attacking them.

Its attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and it lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds while invisible or 5 seconds while firing.

spells.name: Two-Shiv Poison
spells.description: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their movement speed. Against minions and monsters the poison also slows attack speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: While Two-Shiv Poison is ready to cast, Shaco's basic attacks apply Two-Shiv Poison for {{ e4 }} seconds, reducing Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and also reducing Attack Speed by {{ e3 }}% if the target is a minion or monster.

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to target enemy and applies Two-Shiv Poison for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Hallucinate
spells.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies. (Deals half damage to turrets.)  Upon death, it explodes, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Shaco vanishes briefly and reappears with a clone that lasts up to 18 seconds. The clone deals 75% of Shaco's damage and receives {{ e2 }}% increased damage.

On death, the clone detonates, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

The clone can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

spells.name: Twilight Assault
spells.description: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.
spells.tooltip:
Shen recalls his spirit blade and draws it. Enemies it collides with are slowed by {{ e4 }}% when moving away from Shen for the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

Shen's next {{ e3 }} attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their target's max health as bonus magic damage. If the spirit blade collided with an enemy champion, those attacks deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }})% instead and have +{{ e9 }}% Attack Speed.

Each attack deals {{ e6 }} extra magic damage to monsters and minions (max {{ e7 }}).

spells.name: Spirit's Refuge
spells.description: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.
spells.tooltip:
Shen's spirit blade creates a defensive zone for {{ e1 }} seconds. Basic attacks that would hit Shen or an allied champion in the zone are blocked.

If there are no champions to protect in the zone when it starts, the spirit blade will not activate until one enters or {{ e2 }} seconds pass.

spells.name: Shadow Dash
spells.description: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Dealing damage with Shadow Dash or Twilight Assault recovers {{ f1 }} Energy.

Active: Shen dashes in a direction, dealing {{ e2 }} [+{{ f2 }}] physical damage to enemy champions and neutral monsters in his path and taunting them for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Stand United
spells.description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
spells.tooltip: Shen grants a shield to a target allied champion that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e2 }} seconds. After channeling for {{ f1 }} seconds, Shen and his spirit blade teleport to the ally's location.

spells.name: Twin Bite
spells.description:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.
spells.tooltip:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack, dealing (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage on the second attack. The bonus damage is equal to {{ e1 }}% of Shyvana's Attack Damage. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.

spells.name: Burnout
spells.description:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout.

Dragon Form: Burnout scorches the ground beneath it, enemies on the scorched earth continue to take damage.
spells.tooltip:
Shyvana deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to nearby enemies ({{ e4 }}% bonus damage to monsters) and moves {{ e2 }}% faster for 3 seconds. {{ e5 }}% of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active.

Shyvana's Movement Speed bonus is reduced over time. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout by 1 second to a maximum of 4 seconds.

Dragon Form: Burnout scorches the earth, continuing to damage enemies that stand on it.

spells.name: Flame Breath
spells.description:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath engulfs all units in a cone in front of her.
spells.tooltip:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies it passes through, debuffing them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks to debuffed targets deal {{ e4 }}% of their maximum Health as magic damage on-hit. (Max: 100 vs monsters)

Dragon Form: Flame Breath engulfs all units in a cone in front of her.

spells.name: Dragon's Descent
spells.description:
Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Passive: Shyvana generates {{ e3 }} Fury every 1.5 seconds. Basic Attacks generate {{ e2 }} Fury.

spells.name: Poison Trail
spells.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second.

spells.name: Mega Adhesive
spells.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing enemies who walk on it.
spells.tooltip:
Singed leaves a sticky area on the ground for {{ e2 }} seconds, slowing enemies in the area by {{ e1 }}% (lasts {{ e3 }} second after leaving).

If Singed flings a target into the zone, it will root them.

spells.name: Fling
spells.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
spells.tooltip:
Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage. Max 300 bonus damage against minions and monsters.

If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Insanity Potion
spells.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.
spells.tooltip: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him {{ e1 }} Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regen, and Mana Regen for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Decimating Smash
spells.description: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.
spells.tooltip:
Sion charges up a heavy blow for up to 2 seconds. When released, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to enemies in the area ({{ e8 }}% damage to minions). Enemies hit are briefly slowed.

If Sion charges for at least 1 second, enemies are knocked up and stunned for 1.25 to 2.25 seconds.

spells.name: Soul Furnace
spells.description: Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Sion gains {{ e5 }} maximum Health whenever he kills a unit ({{ e6 }} for large monster and champion kill or assist). Current Bonus: {{ f1 }}

Active: Sion shields himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) ({{ e3 }}% of maximum Health) for 6 seconds. After {{ e7 }} seconds, while the shield holds, Sion can reactivate to deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e4 }}% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage to enemies around himself. Max 400 bonus damage against minions and monsters.

spells.name: Roar of the Slayer
spells.description: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging and slowing all enemies that it passes through.
spells.tooltip:
Sion fires a short range shockwave, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first target hit, slowing it by {{ e2 }}%, and reducing its Armor by {{ e5 }}% for 2.5 seconds.

If the target is not a champion, they will be knocked back. All enemies that the knocked back unit passes through will take {{ e6 }}% bonus damage and be slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Unstoppable Onslaught
spells.description: Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.
spells.tooltip:
Sion charges in a direction for 8 seconds and can steer slowly towards the mouse cursor. While charging, Sion is immune to all Crowd Control. Reactivating will cancel Sion's charge early.

When Sion collides with an enemy champion or wall, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocks up and stuns enemies in a small area for {{ e5 }} seconds. Enemies in a larger area take the same damage and have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 3 seconds.

The damage increases to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) and the stun duration increases to {{ e6 }} seconds as Sion charges farther.

spells.name: Boomerang Blade
spells.description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.
spells.tooltip: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first target hit and {{ e2 }}% reduced damage to each subsequent target down to a minimum of {{ e3 }}%.

spells.name: Ricochet
spells.description: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.
spells.tooltip:
Sivir's next {{ e4 }} basic attacks bounce to nearby targets, dealing {{ f1 }} physical damage to the first target and {{ f2 }} physical damage to each subsequent target.

If a given Ricochet attack critically strikes its first target, all subsequent bounces from that attack will also critically strike.

Targets cannot be hit more than once by a given Ricochet attack and on-hit effects are applied only to the first target of each attack.

spells.name: Spell Shield
spells.description: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.
spells.tooltip:
Sivir creates a magical barrier for {{ e1 }} seconds that blocks the next incoming enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Sivir regains {{ e2 }} Mana.

spells.name: On The Hunt
spells.description: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Sivir gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.

Active: Sivir rallies her allies for {{ e3 }} seconds, granting all nearby allies an initial {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed bonus that reduces to {{ e2 }}% after the first {{ e5 }} seconds of On The Hunt elapse.

spells.name: Crystal Slash
spells.description: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Skarner deals {{ f1 }} physical damage to all nearby enemies. If a unit is struck, he charges himself with Crystal Energy for {{ e2 }} seconds.

While Skarner is charged, Crystal Slash deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage.

Basic attacks lower Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.25 seconds (quadrupled against champions).

spells.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
spells.description: Skarner gains a shield and has increased Movement Speed while the shield persists.
spells.tooltip: Skarner is shielded for {{ f1 }} ({{ e1 }}% of his maximum health) (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds. While the shield persists, Skarner gains movement speed that ramps up to {{ e5 }}% over 3 seconds.

spells.name: Fracture
spells.description: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them. Basic attacking these enemies within a short window will stun them.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Crystallizing enemies with Fracture and Impale grants Crystal Charge for the disable duration and reduces the cooldown of Fracture by the same amount.

Active: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, slowing targets hit by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds and reducing the blast's speed.

Enemies hit by Fracture are afflicted with Crystal Venom for {{ e6 }} seconds, causing Skarner's next basic attack against them to deal {{ e2 }} additional physical damage and stun the target for {{ e3 }} second.

spells.name: Impale
spells.description: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, the target will be dealt additional damage.
spells.tooltip: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion for {{ e1 }} seconds, dealing {{ a2 }} physical damage plus {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Skarner can move freely during this time, and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt the same damage again.

spells.name: Hymn of Valor
spells.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies and extends the duration of her aura for each ally she aids.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the nearest two enemies (prioritizes Champions). Sona gains an aura that grants allies {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage on their next attack for {{ e4 }} seconds. Sona's aura lasts {{ e3 }} seconds and is extended by {{ e5 }} seconds for each ally she aids.

Power Chord - Staccato: Deals {{ e6 }}% bonus power chord damage.

spells.name: Aria of Perseverance
spells.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield and extends the duration of her aura for each ally she aids.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Heals Sona and the most wounded nearby allied Champion for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}). This heal increases by {{ e5 }}% per {{ e6 }}% missing Health on the target. Sona gains an aura that grants allies a {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) shield for {{ e9 }} seconds. Sona's aura lasts for {{ e7 }} seconds and is extended by {{ e8 }} seconds for each ally she aids.

Power Chord - Diminuendo: Reduces an enemy's total damage output by {{ e4 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) for {{ e10 }} seconds.

spells.name: Song of Celerity
spells.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting herself bonus Movement Speed that decays over time. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants nearby allied champions bonus Movement Speed and extends the duration of her aura for each ally she aids.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Grants Sona {{ f3 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) Movement Speed that decays over time and creates an aura of Celerity around her that lasts {{ e5 }} seconds. Tagging an ally with the zone grants the ally {{ f4 }}% (+{{ f5 }}%) Movement Speed for {{ e7 }} seconds, and Sona increases the duration of her aura and her own Movement Speed buff by {{ e6 }} seconds.

Power Chord - Tempo: Slows an enemy by {{ e4 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e8 }} seconds.

spells.name: Crescendo
spells.description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank increases the power of all aura effects.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Strikes an irresistible chord, stunning enemy Champions and forcing them to dance for {{ e5 }} seconds and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Passive: Each rank of Crescendo grants Sona increased power in her auras. Song of Celerity also gains increased power in Sona's self buff.

+{{ e2 }} magic damage for Hymn of Valor
+{{ e3 }} shield power for Aria of Perseverance
+{{ e4 }}% Movement Speed for Song of Celerity

spells.name: Starcall
spells.description: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health and gains movement speed when moving away from enemy champions.
spells.tooltip:
Calls down a star from Soraka to a target location. Enemies standing in the explosion radius take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

If Starcall hits a champion Soraka gains Rejuvenation for {{ e5 }} seconds, which restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) health per second and grants {{ e9 }}% movement speed when not moving toward enemy champions.

spells.name: Astral Infusion
spells.description: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.
spells.tooltip:
Restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health to another champion ally.

If cast while affected by Rejuvenation, Soraka will grant her target its benefits for {{ f1 }} seconds.

Cannot be cast if Soraka is below 5% Health.

spells.name: Equinox
spells.description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.
spells.tooltip:
Creates a zone at target location for 1.5 seconds, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemy Champions in the cast radius. Enemy Champions standing in the zone are silenced until they leave.

When the zone disappears, all enemy Champions still standing in the zone are rooted for {{ e1 }} second(s) and are dealt {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Wish
spells.description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.
spells.tooltip: Calls upon divine powers to restore {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to all allied Champions. Wish's power is increased by 50% on each Champion below 40% Health.

spells.name: Decrepify
spells.description: Swain sets his raven to cripple an enemy. Over the next 3 seconds, the target is damaged and slowed.
spells.tooltip: Swain sets his raven to cripple an enemy. Over the next 3 seconds, the target takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second and is slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Nevermove
spells.description: Swain marks a target area. After a short delay, mighty talons grab hold of enemy units, dealing damage and rooting them.
spells.tooltip: Swain marks a target area. After a short delay, talons grab hold of enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Torment
spells.description: Swain afflicts his target, dealing damage to them over time and causing them to take increased damage from Swain.
spells.tooltip: Swain afflicts his target for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds. Swain deals {{ e2 }}% increased damage to the afflicted target.

spells.name: Ravenous Flock
spells.description: Swain inspires dread in his enemies by temporarily taking the form of a raven. During this time ravens strike out at up to 3 nearby enemies. Each raven deals damage and heals Swain for half of the damage dealt.
spells.tooltip:
Toggle: Swain transforms into the form of a raven. During this time, up to 3 lesser ravens strike out at nearby enemies each second, prioritizing champions. Each raven deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and heals Swain for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt against champions, and {{ e5 }}% against minions.

The cost to sustain Ravenous Flock increases by {{ e4 }} Mana each second.
spells.resource: {{ e2 }} Initial Mana Cost Per Second

spells.name: Dark Sphere
spells.description: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.
spells.tooltip:
Conjures a Dark Sphere dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The sphere remains for {{ e2 }} seconds and can be manipulated by Syndra's other abilities.

This spell can be cast while moving.

spells.name: Force of Will
spells.description: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Movement Speed of enemies.
spells.tooltip:
First Cast: Grabs target Dark Sphere or enemy minion. If no target is selected, grabs nearest Dark Sphere.

Second Cast: Throws the Dark Sphere or enemy minion. Enemies hit take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ f2 }} seconds.

This spell can be cast while moving.

spells.name: Scatter the Weak
spells.description: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.
spells.tooltip:
Knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to them and any enemies they collide with.

Dark Spheres that are knocked back stun all enemies in their path for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Unleashed Power
spells.description: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.
spells.tooltip:
Draws upon Syndra's full cataclysmic power, harnessing all Dark Spheres to deal magic damage to target enemy Champion. Unleashed Power manipulates the three Dark Spheres orbiting Syndra, in addition to Dark Spheres previously created.

Damage per sphere: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}).
Minimum total damage: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

spells.name: Tongue Lash
spells.description: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit. This ability gains a stun after three stacks of An Acquired Taste.
spells.tooltip:
Damage the first enemy hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }}s. Champions with 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste will additionally be stunned for {{ e6 }}s.

Activate Devour while your tongue is in midair to devour monsters/minions from a distance.

spells.name: Devour
spells.description: Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.
spells.tooltip:
Devour a target for {{ e1 }}s (half that for enemy champions.) Enemies are dealt {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their maximum health as magic damage (maximum of {{ e2 }} against neutral monsters).

Enemy Champions: Requires 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste to be devoured. While holding an enemy champion, Tahm Kench is slowed by 95%.

Allied Champions: While holding an allied champion, Tahm Kench gains {{ e4 }}% movement speed toward enemy champions.

Minions and Monsters: Reactivate to spit them, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to targets hit.

spells.name: Thick Skin
spells.description: Tahm Kench turns incoming damage into gray health. As gray health decays, Tahm Kench is healed for a percentage of the gray health amount. When activated, this ability turns all gray health into a shield.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Damage taken while this ability is not cooling down is converted to gray health. If allowed to decay, {{ e2 }}% of gray health will turn back into health.

Active: Convert all of your gray health into a shield that lasts {{ e1 }} seconds, but falls off gradually over that time.

spells.name: Abyssal Voyage
spells.description: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks and abilities, gaining extra damage based on his bonus health. When activated, Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Basic attacks and damaging abilities deal an additional {{ f1 }} (20 + {{ e2 }}% of Tahm Kench's bonus health) magic damage.

Active: Begin to channel for up to 15 seconds. During this time, one ally champion can right click Tahm Kench to join in. Alternatively, reactivate this ability to travel alone. On reactivation or once an ally has opted in, Tahm travels to the target location. Incoming champion damage breaks the channel.

'Boy, the world's one river, and I'm its king. Ain't no place I ain't been; ain't no place I can't go again.'

spells.name: Noxian Diplomacy
spells.description: Talon's next basic attack deals bonus physical damage. If the target is a champion, they will bleed, taking additional physical damage over a period of time and revealing their location for the duration.
spells.tooltip: Talon's next basic attack deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. If the target is a champion, the target will bleed for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage over {{ e5 }} seconds, revealing their location for the duration.

spells.name: Rake
spells.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. Additionally the enemy is slowed for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. Additionally the enemy is slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Cutthroat
spells.description: Talon instantly appears behind his target, briefly slowing them and amplifying his damage against that target.
spells.tooltip: Talon teleports to the far side of his target, slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e1 }} second and amplifying Talon's damage against the target by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Shadow Assault
spells.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.
spells.tooltip: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes invisible for up to {{ e5 }} seconds, gaining {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies they pass through.

spells.name: Imbue
spells.description: Taric brings forth earthen energy to heal an ally and himself. This heal is more potent when Taric heals only himself.
spells.tooltip: Taric brings forth earthen energy to heal a target ally and himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e6 }}% of Taric's bonus health). If he targets himself, the heal increases by {{ e4 }}% restoring {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) health.

spells.name: Shatter
spells.description: Taric is protected by a hardening aura, increasing the Armor of himself and nearby allied champions. He may choose to splinter the enchanted rocks surrounding him to deal damage and decrease the Armor of nearby enemies at the cost of some Armor for a short time.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Taric's gemstones increase his Armor by {{ e3 }}. Additionally, nearby allied champions gain {{ f1 }} Armor ({{ e4 }}% of Taric's Armor).

Active: Taric shatters his armor, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and reducing their Armor by {{ e2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) for {{ e5 }} seconds. Taric loses {{ e3 }} Armor while Shatter is on cooldown.

spells.name: Dazzle
spells.description: Taric emits a brilliant ball of prismatic light from his gemmed shield, stunning his target and damaging them based on how close he is to them.
spells.tooltip: Taric fires a prismatic sphere at a target enemy, stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing between {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. Dazzle's damage increases the closer Taric is to the target.

spells.name: Radiance
spells.description: Taric slams his hammer into the ground to deal damage to nearby enemies. For a time after, Taric's gems radiate energy, empowering Taric and his allies with bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power.
spells.tooltip:
Taric slams his hammer into the ground, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

For the next {{ e2 }} seconds, Taric's gems radiate energy, granting him {{ e3 }} Attack Damage and Ability Power and his nearby allies half of the bonuses.

spells.name: Blinding Dart
spells.description: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and blinds the target for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Move Quick
spells.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Movement Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Movement Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Teemo's Movement Speed is increased by {{ e1 }}% unless he has been damaged by an enemy champion or turret in the last 5 seconds.

Active: Teemo sprints, gaining twice his normal bonus for 3 seconds. This bonus is not lost when struck.

spells.name: Toxic Shot
spells.description: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.
spells.tooltip: Teemo's basic attacks poison their target, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magical damage upon impact and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magical damage each second for 4 seconds.

spells.name: Noxious Trap
spells.description: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.
spells.tooltip:
Tosses a stored mushroom as a trap that detonates if an enemy steps on it, spreading poison to nearby enemies that slows Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%, reveals them and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds.

Traps last {{ e5 }} minutes and take {{ e4 }} second to arm and stealth. If a thrown trap lands on another trap, it will bounce up to {{ e6 }} Teemos further before planting.

Teemo forages for a mushroom every {{ f1 }} seconds, but he is only big enough to carry 3 at once.

spells.name: Death Sentence
spells.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
spells.tooltip:
Thresh grabs an enemy, then pull them to him or leaps to them.
He throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to the first unit hit and pulling them toward him for 1.5 seconds.

Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds if it strikes an enemy.

Reactivate this ability to pull Thresh to the bound enemy.

spells.name: Dark Passage
spells.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
spells.tooltip:
Thresh creates a shielding lantern that an ally can use to dash to him.
Thresh throws the Lantern to a point. If an ally near the Lantern clicks it, they pick it up, and Thresh pulls both back to him.

Additionally, the Lantern will grant a shield lasting 4 seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage to Thresh and up to one ally if they come near the Lantern.

spells.name: Flay
spells.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Thresh deals {{ f1 }}-{{ f2 }} Magic Damage on each hit, which builds up when not attacking.
This value is equal to total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% of Attack Damage, based on the amount of time since his last attack.

Active: Thresh knocks nearby enemies in the direction of his choice.
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage in a line beginning behind him. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.

spells.name: The Box
spells.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
spells.tooltip:
Thresh traps enemies inside walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
He creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy Champions who walk through a wall suffer {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 2 seconds, but break that wall.

Once one wall is broken, remaining walls deal no damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.

spells.name: Rapid Fire
spells.description: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.
spells.tooltip: Active: Increases Tristana's Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Rocket Jump
spells.description: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.
spells.tooltip:
Tristana launches herself to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and slowing surrounding enemies by 60% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Kills, Assists, and max stack Explosive Charge detonations on Champions reset Rocket Jump's cooldown.

spells.name: Explosive Charge
spells.description: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Enemies explode when slain by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

Active: Places a bomb on an enemy or turret that explodes after 4 seconds, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage. Each attack and ability charges the bomb's damage by +{{ e8 }}%.

At 4 charges, the bomb explodes immediately. The detonation radius is twice as large if used on a turret.

spells.name: Buster Shot
spells.description: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.
spells.tooltip: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at an enemy unit. This deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks surrounding units back {{ e2 }} distance.

spells.name: Chomp
spells.description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.
spells.tooltip:
Trundle lunges at his opponent with his next basic attack, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and briefly slowing his target.

This attack increases Trundle's Attack Damage by {{ e2 }} for 8 seconds, with his opponent losing half of this amount.

spells.name: Frozen Domain
spells.description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.
spells.tooltip: Trundle coats target location with ice for {{ e4 }} seconds, gaining {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed, {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }}% increased healing and regeneration from all sources.

spells.name: Pillar of Ice
spells.description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.
spells.tooltip: Trundle creates an icy pillar at target location for {{ e1 }} seconds, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Subjugate
spells.description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.
spells.tooltip: Trundle drains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of an enemy champion's maximum Health as Magic Damage and {{ e2 }}% of their Armor and Magic Resist, half immediately and half over {{ e3 }} seconds. The Armor and Magic Resist is returned {{ e3 }} seconds after the drain ends.

spells.name: Bloodlust
spells.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Tryndamere thirsts for blood, gaining {{ e1 }} Attack Damage plus {{ e2 }} per 1% Health missing.

Active: Tryndamere consumes his Fury, restoring {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, plus {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Health per Fury consumed.

spells.name: Mocking Shout
spells.description: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.
spells.tooltip: Decreases surrounding champions' Attack Damage by {{ e1 }} for {{ e4 }} seconds, and enemies with their backs turned also have their Movement Speed reduced by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Spinning Slash
spells.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
spells.tooltip:
Tryndamere spins through his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path and generating Fury.

Spinning Slash's cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Tryndamere critically strikes. This effect is doubled against champions.

spells.name: Undying Rage
spells.description: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.
spells.tooltip: Tryndamere becomes completely immune to death for {{ e3 }} seconds, refusing to be reduced below {{ e2 }} Health and instantly gaining {{ e1 }} Fury.

spells.name: Wild Cards
spells.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
spells.tooltip: Throws three cards that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

spells.name: Pick A Card
spells.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.
spells.tooltip:
Cast once to shuffle the deck and again to choose your card, enhancing your next attack.

Blue Card deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and restores {{ e6 }} Mana.

Red Card deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to units around the target and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for 2.5 seconds.

Gold Card deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and stuns for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Stacked Deck
spells.description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Every {{ e4 }} attacks, Twisted Fate deals an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage.

In addition, his Attack Speed is increased by {{ e3 }}%.

spells.name: Destiny
spells.description: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Reveals all enemy champions (including stealthed champions) on the map for {{ e1 }} seconds.

While Destiny is active, Twisted Fate can teleport up to {{ e4 }} units away in 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Ambush
spells.description:
Twitch becomes invisible for a short duration and, while invisible, he gains Movement Speed. When leaving invisibility, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.

When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.
spells.tooltip:
After {{ e4 }} seconds of not taking damage, Twitch is stealthed and gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for up to {{ e2 }} seconds. Upon leaving stealth, he gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e6 }} seconds.

When an enemy champion affected by Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.

spells.name: Venom Cask
spells.description: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.
spells.tooltip: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area adding {{ e1 }} stacks of Deadly Venom and slowing targets by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Contaminate
spells.description: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e2 }} physical damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) per stack of Deadly Venom to all nearby enemies affected by Deadly Venom.

spells.name: Rat-Ta-Tat-Tat
spells.description: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.
spells.tooltip:
For {{ e2 }} seconds Twitch gains {{ e5 }} Attack Range and {{ e1 }} Bonus Attack Damage.

For the duration, his basic attacks become piercing bolts that deal {{ e3 }}% less damage to subsequent targets, down to a minimum of {{ e4 }}% damage.

spells.name: Tiger Stance
spells.description: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds, and his first basic attack will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks deal extra damage.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks deal {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage, and Udyr will perform a Tiger Strike with his first basic attack, dealing bonus {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage over 2 seconds.

Activation: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Turtle Stance
spells.description: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr gains Life Steal.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal.

Activation: Gains a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Bear Stance
spells.description: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks stun the target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target again for 5 seconds.

Activation: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and ignores unit collision for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Phoenix Stance
spells.description: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies for 5 seconds. Persistent Effect - With the first basic attack and every third attack after, Udyr engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Burns enemies in front of Udyr on his first basic attack and every third attack after, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activation: Unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Acid Hunter
spells.description: Urgot fires an Acid Hunter missile that collides with the first enemy it hits, slowing the target if he has his Terror Capacitor up. Acid Hunter missile-locks on enemies affected by Noxian Corrosive Charge.
spells.tooltip:
Urgot fires a missile toward the cursor that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If Acid Hunter kills a unit half its mana cost is refunded.

Missile-lock can be achieved by holding the cursor over a target afflicted by Noxian Corrosive Charge.

spells.name: Terror Capacitor
spells.description: Urgot charges up his capacitor to gain a shield. While the shield is active, Urgot gains slowing attacks.
spells.tooltip: Urgot charges up his terror capacitor to gain a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e4 }}% of his maximum mana (+{{ f1 }}) damage for 5 seconds. While the shield is active, Urgot's attacks and missiles slow targets by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Noxian Corrosive Charge
spells.description: Urgot launches a corrosive charge that damages enemies in an area and reduces their Armor.
spells.tooltip:
Urgot launches a Corrosive Charge at a target location. Enemies afflicted by the charge have their Armor reduced by {{ e2 }}% and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

Acid Hunter is able to missile-lock onto targets affected by Noxian Corrosive Charge.

spells.name: Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser
spells.description: Urgot charges up his Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser, swapping positions with the target and terrifying nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds. His target is suppressed for the duration of the channel. He gains Damage Reduction during and after the swap.
spells.tooltip:
Urgot targets an enemy champion and channels his Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser for 1 second, swapping locations with his target afterward and terrifying nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds. His target is suppressed for the duration of the channel.

Urgot takes {{ e2 }}% reduced damage for {{ e4 }} seconds beginning at the start of the channel, and his target is slowed by 40% for 3 seconds after being swapped.

spells.name: Piercing Arrow
spells.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
spells.tooltip:
First Cast: Varus starts drawing back his next shot, gradually increasing its range and damage.

Second Cast: Varus fires, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage, reduced by {{ e3 }}% per enemy hit (minimum 33%).

While preparing to shoot Varus' Movement Speed is slowed by 20%. After 4 seconds, Piercing Arrow fails but refunds half its Mana cost.

spells.name: Blighted Quiver
spells.description: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and apply Blight for {{ e3 }} seconds (stacks {{ e4 }} times).

Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of the target's maximum Health per stack (Max: 360 total damage vs Monsters).

spells.name: Hail of Arrows
spells.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.
spells.tooltip:
Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and desecrates the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Desecrated Ground slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and reduces self healing effects by {{ e4 }}%.

spells.name: Chain of Corruption
spells.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
spells.tooltip:
Varus flings out a tendril of corruption that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and immobilizes the first enemy champion hit for 2 seconds.

The corruption then spreads towards nearby uninfected enemy champions. If it reaches them, they take the same damage, are also immobilized. Immobilized units gain 3 Blight stacks over the duration.

spells.name: Tumble
spells.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.
spells.tooltip: Rolls a short distance. The next basic attack within {{ e1 }} seconds deals {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage, equal to {{ e2 }}% of total Attack Damage.

spells.name: Silver Bolts
spells.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)
spells.tooltip:
Every third consecutive attack or ability against an enemy deals an additional {{ e1 }}% of the enemy's maximum Health as true damage.

Deals a maximum of 200 damage vs. Monsters and a minimum of {{ e2 }} damage vs. all targets.

spells.name: Condemn
spells.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
spells.tooltip: Fires a bolt that knocks back target enemy and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Enemies that collide with terrain take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) additional physical damage and are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Final Hour
spells.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.
spells.tooltip: Gains {{ e1 }} Bonus Attack Damage for {{ e2 }} seconds. While active, Tumble grants invisibility for {{ e3 }} second, and Night Hunter's bonus Movement Speed is increased to {{ e4 }}.

spells.name: Baleful Strike
spells.description: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Unleashes a bolt of dark energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first two enemies hit. For each target killed, Veigar gains 1 ability power. This bonus is doubled against champions, large minions and large monsters.

Passive: Veigar gains {{ e2 }} ability power on champion kills and assists.

Ability power bonus: +{{ f1 }}

spells.name: Dark Matter
spells.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands.
spells.tooltip: After 1.2 seconds, dark matter falls from the sky to the target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Event Horizon
spells.description: After a brief delay Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter.
spells.tooltip: After a {{ e2 }} second delay, Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, forming a pentagon of walls. Enemies who attempt to pass through the perimeter are stopped and stunned for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Primordial Burst
spells.description: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large base amount of magic damage plus 80% of his target's ability power.
spells.tooltip: Blasts an enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus 80% of his target's ability power in magic damage.

spells.name: Plasma Fission
spells.description: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
spells.tooltip:
Vel'Koz shoots a plasma bolt that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and applies a slow of {{ e5 }}% that decays over {{ e4 }} second(s).

Upon reactivation or upon hitting an enemy, the bolt splits at a 90 degree angle.

spells.name: Void Rift
spells.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
spells.tooltip: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. After a delay, it deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage. Both hits add a stack of Organic Deconstruction.

spells.name: Tectonic Disruption
spells.description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
spells.tooltip:
Vel'Koz disrupts a nearby area which, after a delay, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks up enemies hit for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Any enemies hit that are close to Vel'Koz will be pushed slightly in the direction the ability was cast.

spells.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
spells.description: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals damage and slows enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds, dealing Magic Damage up to a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}), and slows enemies hit by {{ e3 }}% for 1 second. Adds a stack of Organic Deconstruction every 0.5 seconds.

Can be cancelled by recasting.

spells.name: Vault Breaker
spells.description: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.
spells.tooltip:
Charges a powerful punch that carries Vi forward.

First Cast: Slows Movement Speed by 15% while increasing damage and dash range over 1.25 seconds.

Second Cast: Dashes forward dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying Denting Blows to all enemies hit (deals 75% damage to minions and monsters). Stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, knocking it back.

spells.name: Denting Blows
spells.description: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.
spells.tooltip: Every 3rd attack on the same target deals an additional {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) of the target's maximum Health as physical damage, reduces its Armor by 20% and grants Vi {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for 4 seconds (max 300 damage vs. minions and monsters).

spells.name: Excessive Force
spells.description: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.
spells.tooltip:
Causes next basic attack to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and enemies behind it.

Vi charges a new punch every {{ f1 }} seconds and can hold 2 charges at once.

spells.name: Assault and Battery
spells.description: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.
spells.tooltip:
Targets an enemy champion and chases it down, knocking it up for 1.25 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

While charging, Vi cannot be stopped and will knock aside enemies in the way, dealing 75% damage to them.

spells.name: Siphon Power
spells.description:
Viktor blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, gaining a shield and empowering his next basic attack.

Augment: Viktor gains bonus Movement Speed after casting.
spells.tooltip:
Viktor blasts an enemy unit for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, granting Viktor a {{ e4 }} (+{{ f3 }}) damage shield for {{ e2 }} seconds. Viktor's next basic attack deals {{ f2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage. (The bonus damage scales with Viktor's level).

Augment - Turbocharge: Viktor gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Gravity Field
spells.description:
Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies in its radius. Enemies who stay within the device for too long are stunned.

Augment: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.
spells.tooltip:
Viktor deploys a gravitational imprisonment device for 4 seconds, slowing enemy units by {{ e4 }}% and adding a stack every 0.5 seconds. At 3 stacks the target is stunned for 1.5 seconds.

Augment - Implosion: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.

spells.name: Death Ray
spells.description:
Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.

Augment: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to every enemy in its path.

Augment - Aftershock: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Enemies already hit by the Death Ray will take {{ e2 }}% damage.

spells.name: Chaos Storm
spells.description:
Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage and interrupts enemy channels. The singularity then does magic damage to all nearby enemies every second. Viktor can redirect the singularity.

Augment: The Chaos Storm moves faster.
spells.tooltip:
Viktor conjures a singularity at target location, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and interrupting enemy channels.

Viktor can redirect the singularity for {{ e3 }} seconds, causing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every second to nearby enemies. The singularity will move slower as it attempts to move farther away from Viktor.

Augment - Velocity: Chaos Storm moves 20% faster.

spells.name: Transfusion
spells.description: Vladimir drains life from his target.
spells.tooltip: Vladimir drains the lifeforce of his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

spells.name: Sanguine Pool
spells.description: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.
spells.tooltip:
Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood for 2 seconds, becoming untargetable and slowing enemies above him by 40%.

Vladimir deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }} [15% of bonus Health]) magic damage over the duration and heals himself for 15% of that amount.

spells.name: Tides of Blood
spells.description: Vladimir unleashes a torrent of blood, damaging surrounding enemies. Additionally, multiple Tides of Blood in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Health and deal additional damage, and increases his healing and regeneration.
spells.tooltip:
Vladimir unleashes a torrent of blood, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all nearby enemies.

Each cast gives him an Empowered stack (max 4), increasing his healing and regeneration by {{ e4 }}% each for 10 seconds. Additionally, Tides of Blood cost and base damage increases by 25% per stack.

spells.name: Hemoplague
spells.description: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. Hemoplague deals additional magic damage after a few seconds to infected enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Vladimir infects the target area with a virulent plague, causing {{ e4 }}% increased damage for 5 seconds.

After 5 seconds, infected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Rolling Thunder
spells.description: Volibear drops to all fours and runs faster. This bonus speed increases when chasing enemy champions. The first enemy he attacks is thrown backwards over Volibear.
spells.tooltip:
Volibear drops to all fours to hunt his enemies, gaining {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds. This bonus is enhanced to {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed while moving toward enemy champions.

Volibear's next attack during this time deals an additional {{ e1 }} physical damage and flings the target behind him.

spells.name: Frenzy
spells.description: Volibear's repeated attacks grant him additional Attack Speed. Once Volibear has repeatedly attacked three times, he can perform a vicious bite on his target which deals increased damage based on the target's missing Health.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Volibear gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed with each attack. Stacks up to {{ e2 }} times.

Active: When Volibear has {{ e2 }} stacks of Frenzy, he can bite an enemy to deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }} [{{ e4 }}% of bonus Health]) physical damage, increased by {{ e5 }}% for each {{ e5 }}% Health the target is missing. If Volibear bites a monster, Frenzy's cooldown is reduced by {{ e6 }}%.

spells.name: Majestic Roar
spells.description: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages and slows enemies. Minions and monsters are feared as well.
spells.tooltip:
Volibear deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Minions and monsters are feared as well.

spells.name: Thunder Claws
spells.description: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Volibear erupts with chain lightning, striking up to 4 nearby enemies with {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm empowers Volibear, causing his basic attacks to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage that chains to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies.

spells.name: Hungering Strike
spells.description: Takes a bite out of an enemy unit and heals Warwick.
spells.tooltip: Strikes an enemy for the greater value between {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a1 }}) of the target's maximum Health as magic damage (can only do flat damage to monsters), and heals Warwick for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.

spells.name: Hunters Call
spells.description: Warwick lets out a howl, increasing all nearby friendly champions' Attack Speed for a short time.
spells.tooltip: Warwick lets out a howl that inspires all nearby allied champions, increasing Warwick's Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% and all nearby friendly champions' Attack Speed by half of that for 6 seconds.

spells.name: Blood Scent
spells.description: Warwick passively senses weakened enemy champions around him. The scent of blood sends him into a fury, causing him to move at incredible speeds.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Warwick senses enemy champions under 50% Health within {{ e1 }} distance of him; while he detects a low-health enemy, he reveals them if they are not stealthed and gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed.

spells.name: Infinite Duress
spells.description: Warwick lunges at an enemy champion, suppressing his target and dealing magic damage for a few seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Warwick lunges in front of an enemy champion and suppresses them for {{ e2 }} seconds. During this time, Warwick attacks his victim {{ e4 }} times, dealing a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage (triggers on-hit effects {{ e4 }} times).

Warwick gains {{ e3 }}% Life Steal for the duration.

spells.name: Arcanopulse
spells.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
spells.tooltip:
First cast: Xerath charges Arcanopulse, gradually decreasing his Movement Speed while increasing the spell's range.

Second cast: Xerath fires Arcanopulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line.

While charging Arcanopulse, Xerath cannot attack or cast other spells. If Xerath does not fire the spell, half the Mana cost is refunded.
